    Name the Organisation which released the report “Impact of the Swachh Bharat Mission (Grameen) on the convenience, safety and self-respect of women in rural India” along with Bill and Melinda Gates Foundation (BMGF).

    Correct

    Answer – 4) United Nations Children’s Fund (UNICEF)
    Explanation:
    Union Minister of for Jal Shakti, Gajendra Singh Shekhawat launched Phase II of Swachh Bharat Mission (Grameen) [SBM (G)] at a National Dissemination and Consultation workshop in New Delhi. During the workshop the he also released a study namely “Impact of the Swachh Bharat Mission (Grameen) on the convenience, safety and self-respect of women in rural India” by the UNICEF (United Nations Children’s Fund), and Bill and Melinda Gates Foundation (BMGF) on the impact of the SBM(G) on rural women.

    Incorrect

    Answer – 4) United Nations Children’s Fund (UNICEF)
    Explanation:
    Union Minister of for Jal Shakti, Gajendra Singh Shekhawat launched Phase II of Swachh Bharat Mission (Grameen) [SBM (G)] at a National Dissemination and Consultation workshop in New Delhi. During the workshop the he also released a study namely “Impact of the Swachh Bharat Mission (Grameen) on the convenience, safety and self-respect of women in rural India” by the UNICEF (United Nations Children’s Fund), and Bill and Melinda Gates Foundation (BMGF) on the impact of the SBM(G) on rural women.

  31. Question 31 of 50
    31. Question
    1 points
    Category: Current Affairs

    As per MicroSave Consulting’s (MSC) report titled ‘The real story of women’s financial inclusion in India’, women’s ownership of bank accounts under Pradhan Mantri Jan Dhan Yojana (PMJDY) is increased from 43% in 2014 to ______% in 2017.

    Correct

    Answer – 4) 77
    Explanation:
    In accordance with the report by MicroSave Consulting (MSC) titled “The real story of women’s financial inclusion in India”, the women’s ownership of bank accounts is increased from 43% in 2014 to 77% in 2017 under the flagship scheme Pradhan Mantri Jan Dhan Yojana (PMJDY), however 42% accounts are still inactive. The gender gap in financial inclusion reduced by 14 percentage points in three years (2014-17).

    Incorrect

    Answer – 4) 77
    Explanation:
    In accordance with the report by MicroSave Consulting (MSC) titled “The real story of women’s financial inclusion in India”, the women’s ownership of bank accounts is increased from 43% in 2014 to 77% in 2017 under the flagship scheme Pradhan Mantri Jan Dhan Yojana (PMJDY), however 42% accounts are still inactive. The gender gap in financial inclusion reduced by 14 percentage points in three years (2014-17).

  32. Question 32 of 50
    32. Question
    1 points
    Category: Current Affairs

    Under which section of Banking Regulation Act, 1949, the Ministry of Finance has imposed moratorium on Yes Bank (March 5, 2020 till April 3, 2020).

    Correct

    Answer – 4) Section 45
    Explanation:
    In exercise of the powers conferred by sub-section (2) of section 45 of the Banking Regulation Act, 1949 (10 of 1949), the Central Government, through the Ministry of Finance has imposed moratorium on Yes Bank Limited w.e.f. 6PM of March 5, 2020 till April 3, 2020. The decision has been taken on the recommendations of Reserve Bank of India (RBI) under sub-section (1) of section 45.

    Incorrect

    Answer – 4) Section 45
    Explanation:
    In exercise of the powers conferred by sub-section (2) of section 45 of the Banking Regulation Act, 1949 (10 of 1949), the Central Government, through the Ministry of Finance has imposed moratorium on Yes Bank Limited w.e.f. 6PM of March 5, 2020 till April 3, 2020. The decision has been taken on the recommendations of Reserve Bank of India (RBI) under sub-section (1) of section 45.

  33. Question 33 of 50
    33. Question
    1 points
    Category: Current Affairs

    RBI has restricted the withdrawal limit in Yes Bank during the moratorium period (March 5, 2020 till April 3, 2020) to Rs. ______ per account.

    Correct

    Answer – 3) 50,000
    Explanation:
    The RBI has restricted the withdrawal limit in Yes Bank during the period of moratorium to Rs 50,000 per account. If a depositor maintains more than one account, then also the total amount payable from all the accounts together should not exceed Rs 50,000. In case of unforeseen expenses like medical treatment, higher education, marriage or unavoidable expenses the sum should not exceed 5,00,000 or the actual balance lying to the credit of the account of such depositor.

    Incorrect

    Answer – 3) 50,000
    Explanation:
    The RBI has restricted the withdrawal limit in Yes Bank during the period of moratorium to Rs 50,000 per account. If a depositor maintains more than one account, then also the total amount payable from all the accounts together should not exceed Rs 50,000. In case of unforeseen expenses like medical treatment, higher education, marriage or unavoidable expenses the sum should not exceed 5,00,000 or the actual balance lying to the credit of the account of such depositor.

  34. Question 34 of 50
    34. Question
    1 points
    Category: Current Affairs

    The Employee Provident Fund Organization (EPFO) has reduced the interest rate on EPF deposits for 2019-20 from 8.65% to _____% (7-yr low).

    Correct

    Answer – 4) 8.50
    Explanation:
    EPFO (Employees Provident Fund Organisation) has declined interest rate on EPF deposits for 2019-20 to seven years’ low by 0.15% or 15 basis points fom 8.65% to 8.5%. This downward revision of interest rate was recommended by Finance Investment & Audit Committee (FIAC) with an interest rate of 8.45% but EPFO went for 8.5%.

    Incorrect

    Answer – 4) 8.50
    Explanation:
    EPFO (Employees Provident Fund Organisation) has declined interest rate on EPF deposits for 2019-20 to seven years’ low by 0.15% or 15 basis points fom 8.65% to 8.5%. This downward revision of interest rate was recommended by Finance Investment & Audit Committee (FIAC) with an interest rate of 8.45% but EPFO went for 8.5%.

  35. Question 35 of 50
    35. Question
    1 points
    Category: Current Affairs

    As per the report titled ‘Global trade impact of the Coronavirus (COVID-19) Epidemic’, India has faced a trade impact of $348 million dollars due to slowdown in china’s production. The report was released by which of the following organization?

    Correct

    Answer – 2) United Nations Conference on Trade and Development (UNCTAD)
    Explanation:
    In accordance with the estimates prepared by Division on International Trade and Commodities, UNCTAD and published by United Nations Conference on Trade and Development (UNCTAD) titled “Global trade impact of the Coronavirus (COVID-19) Epidemic”, India is among the top 20 economies most affected by the slowdown of manufacturing in China due to Coronavirus (COVID-19) epidemic has a trade impact of $348 million dollars, which is disrupting world trade and could result in a 50-billion-dollar decrease in global exports.

    Incorrect

    Answer – 2) United Nations Conference on Trade and Development (UNCTAD)
    Explanation:
    In accordance with the estimates prepared by Division on International Trade and Commodities, UNCTAD and published by United Nations Conference on Trade and Development (UNCTAD) titled “Global trade impact of the Coronavirus (COVID-19) Epidemic”, India is among the top 20 economies most affected by the slowdown of manufacturing in China due to Coronavirus (COVID-19) epidemic has a trade impact of $348 million dollars, which is disrupting world trade and could result in a 50-billion-dollar decrease in global exports.

  36. Question 36 of 50
    36. Question
    1 points
    Category: Current Affairs

    Name the person who has been appointed as the administrator of Yes Bank by RBI under 36ACA of the Banking Regulation Act 1949 (for 30 days until April 3, 2020).

    Correct

    Answer – 2) Prashant Kumar
    Explanation:
    In exercise of the powers conferred under 36ACA of the Banking Regulation Act 1949, RBI has also superseded (replaced) the board of YES bank with immediate effect by appointing ex- Deputy Managing Director (DMD) & Chief Financial Officer (CFO) of SBI Prashant Kumar as its administrator for a period of 30 days citing serious deterioration in the financial position of the Bank. His appointment has been made under Section 36ACA (2) of the Act.

    Incorrect

    Answer – 2) Prashant Kumar
    Explanation:
    In exercise of the powers conferred under 36ACA of the Banking Regulation Act 1949, RBI has also superseded (replaced) the board of YES bank with immediate effect by appointing ex- Deputy Managing Director (DMD) & Chief Financial Officer (CFO) of SBI Prashant Kumar as its administrator for a period of 30 days citing serious deterioration in the financial position of the Bank. His appointment has been made under Section 36ACA (2) of the Act.

  37. Question 37 of 50
    37. Question
    1 points
    Category: Current Affairs

    Amrit Kaur has been honored as ‘Women of the year’ for 1947 in ‘100 women of the year’ project by TIME magazine. Name the person who has been honored as ‘Women of the year’ for 1976.

    Correct

    Answer – 3) Indira Gandhi
    Explanation:
    TIME Magazine created 100 New Covers for the Project ‘100 women of the year’ to recognize selected women or groups to represent each year from 1920 to 2019. India’s Freedom Fighter Amrit Kaur will be honored as ‘Women of the Year’ for 1947 & Former prime minister Indira Gandhi for 1976.

    Incorrect

    Answer – 3) Indira Gandhi
    Explanation:
    TIME Magazine created 100 New Covers for the Project ‘100 women of the year’ to recognize selected women or groups to represent each year from 1920 to 2019. India’s Freedom Fighter Amrit Kaur will be honored as ‘Women of the Year’ for 1947 & Former prime minister Indira Gandhi for 1976.

    In Times of India sports award 2019 (TOISA 2019) a special award – Icon of the Century was given to 3-time Olympic gold medalist and hockey legend Balbir Singh.

    Incorrect

    Answer – 4) Balbir Singh
    Explanation:
    In Times of India sports award 2019 (TOISA 2019) a special award – Icon of the Century was given to 3-time Olympic gold medalist and hockey legend Balbir Singh.

  39. Question 39 of 50
    39. Question
    1 points
    Category: Current Affairs

    According to the ‘Freedom in the world 2020’ report released by US based Freedom House, what is India’s rank in ‘Free’ category, which was topped by Finland?

    Correct

    Answer – 5) 83
    Explanation:
    According to the ‘Freedom in the World 2020” report, which analyzes ​​democratic values ​​and people’s freedom in 195 countries & 15 territories and ranks them category-wise, released by the Freedom House, a U.S (United States) -based watchdog that conducts research and advocacy on democracy, India has ranked 83rd in the report along with Timor-Leste and Senegal in ‘Free’ category. While, Finland topped the list as the free democratic country.
    Here’s the list of Top 3& Bottom 3 nation in free category of the report:

    Top 3 nation in free category
    Finland
    Norway
    Sweden
    Bottom 3 nation in free category
    India
    Timor-leste
    Tunisia
    Incorrect

    Answer – 5) 83
    Explanation:
    According to the ‘Freedom in the World 2020” report, which analyzes ​​democratic values ​​and people’s freedom in 195 countries & 15 territories and ranks them category-wise, released by the Freedom House, a U.S (United States) -based watchdog that conducts research and advocacy on democracy, India has ranked 83rd in the report along with Timor-Leste and Senegal in ‘Free’ category. While, Finland topped the list as the free democratic country.
    Here’s the list of Top 3& Bottom 3 nation in free category of the report:

    Top 3 nation in free category
    Finland
    Norway
    Sweden
    Bottom 3 nation in free category
    India
    Timor-leste
    Tunisia

    Slovenia’s – Capital – Ljubljana & Currency – Euro.

    Incorrect

    Answer – 2) Ljubljana & Euro
    Explanation:
    Recently Slovenia’s lawmakers have approved the Leader of Slovenian Democratic Party (SDS), Janez Jansa as Slovenia’s new Prime Minister. He will replace center-left Prime Minister Marjan Sarec, who resigned from his post in January 2020.
    Slovenia’s – Capital – Ljubljana & Currency – Euro.

    1 points
    Category: Static GK

    Manas National Park is located in which Indian State?

    Correct

    Answer – 1) Assam
    Explanation:
    Manas National Park, a UNESCO Natural World Heritage Site located in Assam’s Baksa district, welcomed two female rhinos from Kaziranga National Park on 2nd March 2020 as part of a translocation programme by Assam forest department.

    Incorrect

    Answer – 1) Assam
    Explanation:
    Manas National Park, a UNESCO Natural World Heritage Site located in Assam’s Baksa district, welcomed two female rhinos from Kaziranga National Park on 2nd March 2020 as part of a translocation programme by Assam forest department.

  45. Question 45 of 50
    45. Question
    1 points
    Category: Static GK

    Under Which act Non-Banking Finance Companies (NBFC) registered in India?

    Correct

    Answer – Companies Act, 1956
    Explanation:
    A Non-Banking Financial Company (NBFC) is a company registered under the Companies Act, 1956 and to perform Banking operations it should be registered in RBI under Section 45-IA of the RBI Act, 1934 (It should have a minimum net owned fund of Rs. 200 lakh).

    Incorrect

    Answer – Companies Act, 1956
    Explanation:
    A Non-Banking Financial Company (NBFC) is a company registered under the Companies Act, 1956 and to perform Banking operations it should be registered in RBI under Section 45-IA of the RBI Act, 1934 (It should have a minimum net owned fund of Rs. 200 lakh).

    Incorrect

    Answer – 4) Chhattisgarh

  48. Question 48 of 50
    48. Question
    1 points
    Category: Static GK

    The Kaziranga National Park is located in which Indian state?

    Correct

    Answer – 2) Assam
    Explanation:
    The Ministry of Environment, Forest and Climate Change (MoEFCC) has notified that under the Compensatory Afforestation Fund Management and Planning Authority (CAMPA), a financial assistance of Rs 1.51 crore has been sanctioned to Kaziranga National Park in Kanchanjuri, Assam during the financial years 2018-19 and 2019-2020.For the financial years 2018-19 Rs 94,46,585 was sanctioned while Rs 51,24,670 was allocated for 2019-2020. Also under the Project Tiger scheme, Rs 33 crore was sanctioned to Kaziranga Tiger Reserve, which includes Kaziranga National Park.

    Incorrect

    Answer – 2) Assam
    Explanation:
    The Ministry of Environment, Forest and Climate Change (MoEFCC) has notified that under the Compensatory Afforestation Fund Management and Planning Authority (CAMPA), a financial assistance of Rs 1.51 crore has been sanctioned to Kaziranga National Park in Kanchanjuri, Assam during the financial years 2018-19 and 2019-2020.For the financial years 2018-19 Rs 94,46,585 was sanctioned while Rs 51,24,670 was allocated for 2019-2020. Also under the Project Tiger scheme, Rs 33 crore was sanctioned to Kaziranga Tiger Reserve, which includes Kaziranga National Park.

  49. Question 49 of 50
    49. Question
    1 points
    Category: Static GK

    The National Chambal sanctuary is located at which Indian state?

    Correct

    Answer – 2) Madhya Pradesh
    Explanation:
    Centre notified 870 sq km around the National Chambal Sanctuary in Madhya Pradesh(MP) as eco-sensitive zone (ESZ) to prohibit polluting activities like industries, major hydroelectric project, mining, stone quarrying & big construction within the ‘no-go area’ for the purpose of conservation of water bodies, unique geographical features(ravines), flora & fauna. It is the first and only tri-state riverine protected area in India for the breeding population of Gharial. It is also called as the National Chambal Gharial Wildlife Sanctuary.

    Incorrect

    Answer – 2) Madhya Pradesh
    Explanation:
    Centre notified 870 sq km around the National Chambal Sanctuary in Madhya Pradesh(MP) as eco-sensitive zone (ESZ) to prohibit polluting activities like industries, major hydroelectric project, mining, stone quarrying & big construction within the ‘no-go area’ for the purpose of conservation of water bodies, unique geographical features(ravines), flora & fauna. It is the first and only tri-state riverine protected area in India for the breeding population of Gharial. It is also called as the National Chambal Gharial Wildlife Sanctuary.

  50. Question 50 of 50
    50. Question
    1 points
    Category: Static GK

    Name the constituency where the present Lok Sabha speaker Om Birla elected from (in 17th lok sabha general elections 2019)?

    Correct

    Answer – 2) Kota, Rajasthan
    Explanation:
    Lok Sabha Speaker Om Birla has launched ‘Suposhit Maa Abhiyan’ in his constituency Kota, Rajasthan, to provide nutritional support to pregnant women and adolescent girls. Smriti Irani, Ministry of Women & Child Development & Ministry of Textiles, also presided over the function.
    About Suposhit Maa Abhiyan: In the first phase of the campaign, 1,000 kits of 17 kg balanced diet each was provided to 1,000 pregnant women.

    Incorrect

    Answer – 2) Kota, Rajasthan
    Explanation:
    Lok Sabha Speaker Om Birla has launched ‘Suposhit Maa Abhiyan’ in his constituency Kota, Rajasthan, to provide nutritional support to pregnant women and adolescent girls. Smriti Irani, Ministry of Women & Child Development & Ministry of Textiles, also presided over the function.
    About Suposhit Maa Abhiyan: In the first phase of the campaign, 1,000 kits of 17 kg balanced diet each was provided to 1,000 pregnant women.

  1. Question 1 of 50
    1. Question
    1 points
    Category: Current Affairs

    Union Minister of State (MoS) for shipping Mansukh Mandaviya has inaugurated India’s 1st floating jetty at which Indian state?

    Correct

    Answer – 3) Goa
    Explanation:
    Union Minister of State for shipping Mansukh Mandaviya, inaugurated the India’s first floating jetty on the banks of Mandovi river, Goa and also an immigration facility office at a cruise terminal in Vasco, Goa.

    Incorrect

    Answer – 3) Goa
    Explanation:
    Union Minister of State for shipping Mansukh Mandaviya, inaugurated the India’s first floating jetty on the banks of Mandovi river, Goa and also an immigration facility office at a cruise terminal in Vasco, Goa.

  2. Question 2 of 50
    2. Question
    1 points
    Category: Current Affairs

    The National organic food festival for Women entrepreneurs held at Jawaharlal Nehru stadium, New Delhi (Feb 2020). What is the theme of the festival?

    Correct

    Answer – 5) Unleashing India’s Organic Market Potential
    Explanation:
    Union Food Processing Minister Harsimrat Kaur Badal and Union Minister of Women and Child Development inaugurated National Organic Food Festival for women entrepreneurs at Jawaharlal Nehru Stadium, New Delhi. The theme of the festival is ‘Unleashing India’s Organic Market Potential’.

    Incorrect

    Answer – 5) Unleashing India’s Organic Market Potential
    Explanation:
    Union Food Processing Minister Harsimrat Kaur Badal and Union Minister of Women and Child Development inaugurated National Organic Food Festival for women entrepreneurs at Jawaharlal Nehru Stadium, New Delhi. The theme of the festival is ‘Unleashing India’s Organic Market Potential’.

  3. Question 3 of 50
    3. Question
    1 points
    Category: Current Affairs

    What is the Gross Domestic Product (GDP) of India for the year 2019-20 as per the National Council of Applied Economic Research (NCAER)?

    Correct

    Answer – 4) 4.9%
    Explanation:
    National Council of Applied Economic Research (NCAER), a New Delhi based non-profit think tank of economics, has estimated India’s economic growth rate to be 4.9 % for the current Financial year-FY 2019-20, which is lower than the 5 % estimation by the National Statistical Office (NSO). NCAER has expressed the hope that in the year 2020-21, the country’s growth rate can be up to 5.6%.

    Incorrect

    Answer – 4) 4.9%
    Explanation:
    National Council of Applied Economic Research (NCAER), a New Delhi based non-profit think tank of economics, has estimated India’s economic growth rate to be 4.9 % for the current Financial year-FY 2019-20, which is lower than the 5 % estimation by the National Statistical Office (NSO). NCAER has expressed the hope that in the year 2020-21, the country’s growth rate can be up to 5.6%.

  4. Question 4 of 50
    4. Question
    1 points
    Category: Current Affairs

    The Sweden’s Riksbank (Central Bank) has begun the testing of world’s 1st Central Bank Digital Currency (CBDC) version named _________?

    Correct

    Answer – 4) e-Krona
    Explanation:
    Sveriges Riksbank (or simply the Riksbank), the central bank of Sweden, had begun testing its digital version of currency, e-krona. If this year-long pilot project successful, this would lead to the creation of world’s 1st central bank digital currency(CBDC).

    Incorrect

    Answer – 4) e-Krona
    Explanation:
    Sveriges Riksbank (or simply the Riksbank), the central bank of Sweden, had begun testing its digital version of currency, e-krona. If this year-long pilot project successful, this would lead to the creation of world’s 1st central bank digital currency(CBDC).

  5. Question 5 of 50
    5. Question
    1 points
    Category: Current Affairs

    Which Indian company/Firm has won Best In-house Direct Tax Team of the year award in BRICS CCI’s 2nd edition of Annual Direct Tax Summit & Awards 2020?

    Correct

    Answer – 3) Dharampal Satyapal Group
    Explanation:
    BRICS Chamber of Commerce & Industry (CCI) organised the 2nd edition of Annual Direct Tax Summit & Awards 2020 in union with Achromic Point an international consulting firm. The Award aimed to resolve the issues related to direct tax and its implications. Dharampal Satyapal Limited won the award for Best In-house Direct Tax Team of the year.

    Incorrect

    Answer – 3) Dharampal Satyapal Group
    Explanation:
    BRICS Chamber of Commerce & Industry (CCI) organised the 2nd edition of Annual Direct Tax Summit & Awards 2020 in union with Achromic Point an international consulting firm. The Award aimed to resolve the issues related to direct tax and its implications. Dharampal Satyapal Limited won the award for Best In-house Direct Tax Team of the year.

  6. Question 6 of 50
    6. Question
    1 points
    Category: Current Affairs

    Name the country which is going to host the new edition of AIBA (International Boxing Association) world cup 2020?

    Correct

    Answer – 1) Russia
    Explanation:
    Russia will be the 1st country to host the new format of AIBA (International Boxing Association) Team World Cup 2020 which was approved by AIBA Executive committee members, at the meeting held at Budapest, Hungary, Europe. The Boxing tournament will be coinciding with the 75th anniversary of the victory in World War II under the motto “Boxing for Peace”.

    Incorrect

    Answer – 1) Russia
    Explanation:
    Russia will be the 1st country to host the new format of AIBA (International Boxing Association) Team World Cup 2020 which was approved by AIBA Executive committee members, at the meeting held at Budapest, Hungary, Europe. The Boxing tournament will be coinciding with the 75th anniversary of the victory in World War II under the motto “Boxing for Peace”.

    Explanation:
    Dr Niti Kumar, a Senior Scientist from Division of Molecular Parasitology and Immunology, CSIR-CDRI (Council of Scientific and Industrial Research-Central Drug Research Institute), Lucknow (Uttar Pradesh) to be honoured with SERB (Science and Engineering Research Board) Women Excellence Award-2020 by the President of India, Ram Nath Kovind during National Science Day Celebrations on February 28, 2020, in Vigyan Bhawan, New Delhi.

    Incorrect

    Answer – 5) Dr Niti Kumar
    Explanation:

  9. Question 9 of 50
    9. Question
    1 points
    Category: Current Affairs

    The International judicial conference 2020 with the theme ‘Gender Just World’ held at which Indian state/UT?

    Correct

    Answer – 1) New Delhi
    Explanation:
    Prime Minister Shri Narendra Modi addressed the International Judicial Conference in New Delhi. The theme of the conference was “Gender Just World” while its topic was “Judiciary and The Changing World”. The Conference introduced the “Just World” concept in the Judicial System of India which aims to take the judicial system of the country to every citizen irrespective of their gender.

    Incorrect

    Answer – 1) New Delhi
    Explanation:
    Prime Minister Shri Narendra Modi addressed the International Judicial Conference in New Delhi. The theme of the conference was “Gender Just World” while its topic was “Judiciary and The Changing World”. The Conference introduced the “Just World” concept in the Judicial System of India which aims to take the judicial system of the country to every citizen irrespective of their gender.

  10. Question 10 of 50
    10. Question
    1 points
    Category: Current Affairs

    Dommaraju Gukesh who is in news recently (Feb 2020) related to which sports?

    Correct

    Answer – 3) Chess
    Explanation:
    The 13-year old Young Indian Grandmaster (GM) Dommaraju Gukesh (Youngest GM of India) emerged as champion in the 34th Cannes Open 2020 chess tournament held at Cannes, France by beating Harutyun Bargeshyan (France) in the Final round. Gukesh also won the title in the Hillerod 110th Anniversary Open event 2020 in Denmark and it was his 1st Open Tournament title.

    Incorrect

    Answer – 3) Chess
    Explanation:
    The 13-year old Young Indian Grandmaster (GM) Dommaraju Gukesh (Youngest GM of India) emerged as champion in the 34th Cannes Open 2020 chess tournament held at Cannes, France by beating Harutyun Bargeshyan (France) in the Final round. Gukesh also won the title in the Hillerod 110th Anniversary Open event 2020 in Denmark and it was his 1st Open Tournament title.

  11. Question 11 of 50
    11. Question
    1 points
    Category: Current Affairs

    The 1st ever Khelo India University games was inaugurated at?

    Correct

    Answer – 4) Cuttak, Odisha
    Explanation:
    Prime Minister (PM) Shri Narendra Modi inaugurated the first-ever Khelo India University Games at the Jawaharlal Nehru Indoor Stadium in Cuttack, Odisha through video conferencing. Nearly 3,400 athletes from 159 universities across the country will participate in 17 disciplines including rugby which is among the 6 team events.

    Incorrect

    Answer – 4) Cuttak, Odisha
    Explanation:
    Prime Minister (PM) Shri Narendra Modi inaugurated the first-ever Khelo India University Games at the Jawaharlal Nehru Indoor Stadium in Cuttack, Odisha through video conferencing. Nearly 3,400 athletes from 159 universities across the country will participate in 17 disciplines including rugby which is among the 6 team events.

  12. Question 12 of 50
    12. Question
    1 points
    Category: Current Affairs

    Name the 1st Indian state/UT which achieved 100% LPG coverage due to implementation of PMUY (Pradhan Mantri Ujjwala Yojana) scheme?

    Correct

    Answer – 5) Himachal Pradesh
    Explanation:
    Himachal Pradesh became the 1st state in the country to have 100% LPG (Liquified Petroleum Gas) coverage due to the implementation of PMUY (Pradhan Mantri Ujjwala Yojana) scheme. In addition to PMUY scheme, the state government aslo launched ‘Himachal Grihini Suvidha Yojana’ in May 2018 to cover the scheme to remaining households.

    Incorrect

    Answer – 5) Himachal Pradesh
    Explanation:
    Himachal Pradesh became the 1st state in the country to have 100% LPG (Liquified Petroleum Gas) coverage due to the implementation of PMUY (Pradhan Mantri Ujjwala Yojana) scheme. In addition to PMUY scheme, the state government aslo launched ‘Himachal Grihini Suvidha Yojana’ in May 2018 to cover the scheme to remaining households.

  13. Question 13 of 50
    13. Question
    1 points
    Category: Current Affairs

    To which Indian State/UT NABARD has granted 400.64 crore under Rural Infrastructure Development Fund (RIDF) to boost the infrastructure (Feb 2020)?

    Correct

    Answer – 1) Jammu & Kashmir
    Explanation:
    National Bank for Agriculture and Rural Development (NABARD), an Apex Development Financial Institution in India, has granted a sum of Rs 400.64 crore to the Union Territory (UT) of Jammu and Kashmir(J&K). The amount has been sanctioned under its ‘Rural Infrastructure Development Fund (RIDF) – Trench XXV’for boosting rural infrastructure during the current financial year-FY (2019-20).

    Incorrect

    Answer – 1) Jammu & Kashmir
    Explanation:
    National Bank for Agriculture and Rural Development (NABARD), an Apex Development Financial Institution in India, has granted a sum of Rs 400.64 crore to the Union Territory (UT) of Jammu and Kashmir(J&K). The amount has been sanctioned under its ‘Rural Infrastructure Development Fund (RIDF) – Trench XXV’for boosting rural infrastructure during the current financial year-FY (2019-20).

  14. Question 14 of 50
    14. Question
    1 points
    Category: Current Affairs

    Name the Public sector bank of India which joined hands with Microsoft to train differently abled people for the employment in Banking, Financial Services and Insurance (BFSI) sector?

    Correct

    Answer – 3) State Bank of India
    Explanation:
    Global tech giant Microsoft has collaborated with the State Bank of India (SBI) to train differently-abled people to find jobs in the banking, financial services and insurance (BFSI) sector. As a part of this partnership, 500 differently-abled youths will be trained in 1st year and SBI Foundation & Microsoft will develop an artificial intelligence powered market so that BFSI industry can connect more easily with differently-abled people for employment opportunities.

    Incorrect

    Answer – 3) State Bank of India
    Explanation:
    Global tech giant Microsoft has collaborated with the State Bank of India (SBI) to train differently-abled people to find jobs in the banking, financial services and insurance (BFSI) sector. As a part of this partnership, 500 differently-abled youths will be trained in 1st year and SBI Foundation & Microsoft will develop an artificial intelligence powered market so that BFSI industry can connect more easily with differently-abled people for employment opportunities.

  15. Question 15 of 50
    15. Question
    1 points
    Category: Current Affairs

    The Name Indian State, which ranked top in the 1st Direct Benefit Transfer (DBT) payouts performance rating released by central government for 2019-20?

    Correct

    Answer – 4) Haryana
    Explanation:
    According to the recent ratings regarding Direct Benefit Transfer (DBT) payouts, prepared for the 1st time by the Central Government, Small state Haryana has emerged as the best state in DBT payouts (Rs.4782 crores in over 4 crore transactions) in 2019-20. Whereas, West Bengal has emerged as the worst performer in DBT payouts ranked 36th position.
    DBT performance ranking 2019-20:

    Rank State DBT payout
    1 Haryana Rs.4782 crore
    2 Uttarakhand Rs. 1060 cr
    36 West Bengal Rs. 8793 cr
    Incorrect

    Answer – 4) Haryana
    Explanation:
    According to the recent ratings regarding Direct Benefit Transfer (DBT) payouts, prepared for the 1st time by the Central Government, Small state Haryana has emerged as the best state in DBT payouts (Rs.4782 crores in over 4 crore transactions) in 2019-20. Whereas, West Bengal has emerged as the worst performer in DBT payouts ranked 36th position.
    DBT performance ranking 2019-20:

    Rank State DBT payout
    1 Haryana Rs.4782 crore
    2 Uttarakhand Rs. 1060 cr
    36 West Bengal Rs. 8793 cr

    Incorrect

    Answer – 5) National Institute of Technology, Tiruchi, Tamil Nadu
    Explanation:

  17. Question 17 of 50
    17. Question
    1 points
    Category: Current Affairs

    Name the Indian State, which becomes 1st in the country to launch unified vehicle registration and 2nd to launch unified driving license after Uttar Pradesh.

    Correct

    Answer – 2) Madhya Pradesh
    Explanation:
    Madhya Pradesh(MP) has become 1st state in the country to introduce unified vehicle registration & 2nd state to launch the unified driving license after Uttar Pradesh. The objective of the card is to provide unified smart cards for driving license & vehicle registration with QR code. MP is the first state to issue both smart cards together.

    Incorrect

    Answer – 2) Madhya Pradesh
    Explanation:
    Madhya Pradesh(MP) has become 1st state in the country to introduce unified vehicle registration & 2nd state to launch the unified driving license after Uttar Pradesh. The objective of the card is to provide unified smart cards for driving license & vehicle registration with QR code. MP is the first state to issue both smart cards together.

    Category: Current Affairs

    During the US president Donald Trump’s visit to India (Feb 24-25, 2020), US has finalized the defence deal worth _____ for the sale of six AH-64E Apache Helicopters, and 24 MH-60R Sea Hawk helicopters to India.

    Correct

    Answer – 4) $ 3 Billion
    Explanation:
    During the US president Donald Trump’s visit to India (Feb 24-25, 2020), India – US closed defence deals worth $3 billion which includes the sale of state-of-the-choppers, six AH-64E Apache Helicopters, and 24 MH-60R Sea Hawk helicopters to India under the Foreign Military Sales program of the US government.

    Incorrect

    Answer – 4) $ 3 Billion
    Explanation:
    During the US president Donald Trump’s visit to India (Feb 24-25, 2020), India – US closed defence deals worth $3 billion which includes the sale of state-of-the-choppers, six AH-64E Apache Helicopters, and 24 MH-60R Sea Hawk helicopters to India under the Foreign Military Sales program of the US government.

  20. Question 20 of 50
    20. Question
    1 points
    Category: Current Affairs

    As per the Reserve Bank of India’s (RBI) report titled “Assessment of the progress of digitisation from cash to electronic”, The value of digital payments to GDP increased from 660% in 2014-15 to _____ in 2018-19.

    Correct

    Answer – 3) 862%
    Explanation:
    As per the Reserve Bank of India’s (RBI) report titled “Assessment of the progress of digitisation from cash to electronic”, The value of digital payments to GDP increased from 660% in 2014-15 to 862% in 2018-19. The notes in circulation (NIC) [Currency in Circulation (CIC) – coins in circulation] increased at average rate of 14% between October 2014 and October 2016. The CIC (Currency in Circulation) across the country increased at a Compounded Annual Growth Rate (CAGR) of 10.2% over the past 5 years (2014-15 to 2018-19).

    Incorrect

    Answer – 3) 862%
    Explanation:
    As per the Reserve Bank of India’s (RBI) report titled “Assessment of the progress of digitisation from cash to electronic”, The value of digital payments to GDP increased from 660% in 2014-15 to 862% in 2018-19. The notes in circulation (NIC) [Currency in Circulation (CIC) – coins in circulation] increased at average rate of 14% between October 2014 and October 2016. The CIC (Currency in Circulation) across the country increased at a Compounded Annual Growth Rate (CAGR) of 10.2% over the past 5 years (2014-15 to 2018-19).

    Insurance Regulatory and Development Authority of India (IRDAI) formed a 9-member committee to examine the possibility of allowing life insurers offer indemnity based health policies. Who is the Head of the committee?

    Correct

    Answer – 1) G. Srinivasan
    Explanation:
    The Insurance Regulatory and Development Authority of India (IRDAI), an autonomous body tasked with regulating and promoting the insurance, has formed a 9-member committee led by Mr. G. Srinivasan, Director of National Insurance Academy to examine the possibility of allowing life insurers offer indemnity based health policies.

    Incorrect

    Answer – 1) G. Srinivasan
    Explanation:
    The Insurance Regulatory and Development Authority of India (IRDAI), an autonomous body tasked with regulating and promoting the insurance, has formed a 9-member committee led by Mr. G. Srinivasan, Director of National Insurance Academy to examine the possibility of allowing life insurers offer indemnity based health policies.

    Category: Current Affairs

    According to IQAir AirVisual’s report titled “2019 World Air Quality Report-Region & City PM2.5 Ranking”, what is the India’s Rank in most polluted country list?

    Correct

    Answer – 4) 5
    Explanation:
    In accordance with the “2019 World Air Quality Report-Region & City PM2.5 Ranking” compiled by IQAir AirVisual, India ranked 5th as the most polluted country in the world. Cleanest country – Bahamas & Most polluted country – Bangladesh.
    World most Polluted Countries 2019 (PM2.5)

    Rank Country Average PM2.5 concentration (µg/m³)
    1 Bangladesh 83.3
    2 Pakistan 65.8
    3 Mongolia 62
    4 Afghanistan 58.8
    5 India 58.1
    98 Bahamas 3.3
    Incorrect

    Answer – 4) 5
    Explanation:
    In accordance with the “2019 World Air Quality Report-Region & City PM2.5 Ranking” compiled by IQAir AirVisual, India ranked 5th as the most polluted country in the world. Cleanest country – Bahamas & Most polluted country – Bangladesh.
    World most Polluted Countries 2019 (PM2.5)

    Rank Country Average PM2.5 concentration (µg/m³)
    1 Bangladesh 83.3
    2 Pakistan 65.8
    3 Mongolia 62
    4 Afghanistan 58.8
    5 India 58.1
    98 Bahamas 3.3

    As per the “The Hurun Global Rich List 2020” released jointly by Hurun Research Institute and Shimao Shenkong International Center, who is the world’s richest person?

    Correct

    Answer – 3) Jeff Bezos
    Explanation:
    The Hurun Global Rich List 2020 was jointly released by Shanghai-based Hurun Research Institute and Shenzhen-based Shimao Shenkong International Center. Jeff Bezos retains 1st rank (with $140 Billion wealth) for the third running year and Mukesh Ambani is positioned at 9th with $67 billion wealth.  Also Uday Kotak is listed as The World’s Richest self-made banker.

    Rank Name Wealth
    in Billion    		 Main company(for wealth) Country
    9 Mukesh Ambani USD 67 Reliance India
    1 Jeff Bezos USD 140 Amazon USA
    2 Bernard Arnault USD 107 LVMH France
    3 Bill Gates USD 106 Microsoft USA
    Incorrect

    Answer – 3) Jeff Bezos
    Explanation:
    The Hurun Global Rich List 2020 was jointly released by Shanghai-based Hurun Research Institute and Shenzhen-based Shimao Shenkong International Center. Jeff Bezos retains 1st rank (with $140 Billion wealth) for the third running year and Mukesh Ambani is positioned at 9th with $67 billion wealth.  Also Uday Kotak is listed as The World’s Richest self-made banker.

    3 Bill Gates USD 106 Microsoft USA

    Correct

    Answer – 4) United Kingdom
    Explanation:
    A 5-day (February 24-29,2020) long 5th edition of Indo-UK (United Kingdom) bilateral air exercise “Indradhanush-V” 2020 between Indian Air Force (IAF) and British Royal Air Forces (RAF) has commenced at Air Force Station Hindan in Uttar Pradesh (UP). ‘Base Defence and Force Protection’ was the focus of this year exercise.

    Incorrect

    Answer – 4) United Kingdom
    Explanation:
    A 5-day (February 24-29,2020) long 5th edition of Indo-UK (United Kingdom) bilateral air exercise “Indradhanush-V” 2020 between Indian Air Force (IAF) and British Royal Air Forces (RAF) has commenced at Air Force Station Hindan in Uttar Pradesh (UP). ‘Base Defence and Force Protection’ was the focus of this year exercise.

    Incorrect

    Answer – 2) Bharti AXA General Insurance
    Explanation:
    Bharti AXA General Insurance becomes the 1st non-life insurer in India to use Whatsapp chatbot for entire services such as policy documents delivery, renewal notices & claim intimation for its customers. It will soon start to sell private cars, 2 wheelers & Travel insurance through Whatsapp.

    As per PSB Ease Reform Annual Report 2019-20 the Gross Non-Performing Assets (G-NPA) reduced from Rs. 8.96 lakh crore in March 2018 to Rs. _______lakh crore in December 2019.

    Correct

    Answer – 4) 7.17
    Explanation:
    As per PSB Ease reform report Annual Report 2019-20 the Gross Non-Performing Assets (G-NPA) reduced from Rs. 8.96 lakh crore (14.6%) in March 2018 to Rs. 7.17 lakh crore (11.3%) in December 2019.

    Incorrect

    Answer – 4) 7.17
    Explanation:
    As per PSB Ease reform report Annual Report 2019-20 the Gross Non-Performing Assets (G-NPA) reduced from Rs. 8.96 lakh crore (14.6%) in March 2018 to Rs. 7.17 lakh crore (11.3%) in December 2019.

    Correct

    Answer – 3) Capri Global Capital Limited
    Explanation:
    The Non-Banking Financial Company (NBFC) Capri Global Capital Limited (CGCL) has launched an SME (Small and medium-sized enterprises) lending product “UDAAN” for women entrepreneurs to provide secured loans upto Rs.40 lakhs only for Business purpose with the loan repayment period of 10years to 15 years at a competitive interest rate after conducting due diligence.

    Incorrect

    Answer – 3) Capri Global Capital Limited
    Explanation:
    The Non-Banking Financial Company (NBFC) Capri Global Capital Limited (CGCL) has launched an SME (Small and medium-sized enterprises) lending product “UDAAN” for women entrepreneurs to provide secured loans upto Rs.40 lakhs only for Business purpose with the loan repayment period of 10years to 15 years at a competitive interest rate after conducting due diligence.

  29. Question 29 of 50
    29. Question
    1 points
    Category: Current Affairs

    The Union Cabinet has approved the Surrogacy (Regulation) Bill, 2020. The draft of the bill has included the recommendations of 23-member Committee of the Rajya Sabha. Who is the Head of the committee?

    Correct

    Answer – 3) Bhupender Yadav
    Explanation:
    The Union Cabinet has approved the Surrogacy (Regulation) Bill, 2020. According to the proposed bill, any woman can become a surrogate mother by her own will. Apart from childless Indian couples, widows and divorced women will also get the benefit. The draft of the new bill has included the recommendations of 23-member Committee of the Rajya Sabha headed by BJP MP Bhupender Yadav.

    Incorrect

    Answer – 3) Bhupender Yadav
    Explanation:
    The Union Cabinet has approved the Surrogacy (Regulation) Bill, 2020. According to the proposed bill, any woman can become a surrogate mother by her own will. Apart from childless Indian couples, widows and divorced women will also get the benefit. The draft of the new bill has included the recommendations of 23-member Committee of the Rajya Sabha headed by BJP MP Bhupender Yadav.

  30. Question 30 of 50
    30. Question
    1 points
    Category: Current Affairs

    Tennis Player Maria Sharapova who announced retirement recently (Feb 2020) belongs to which of the following nation?

    Correct

    Answer – 1) Russia
    Explanation:
    Russian tennis star and 5-time Grand Slam winner Maria Yuryevna Sharapova, 32 years old, announced her retirement. She became the World No.1 in 2005 and as a Grand Slam winner with 2 titles in French Open (2012, 2014), an Australian Open (2008), a US [United States] Open (2006) and Wimbledon Open (2004). She won 36 singles titles and netted prize money of $ 38.8 million and the 3rd youngest player to conquer the All England Club’s hallowed grass courts.

    Incorrect

    Answer – 1) Russia
    Explanation:
    Russian tennis star and 5-time Grand Slam winner Maria Yuryevna Sharapova, 32 years old, announced her retirement. She became the World No.1 in 2005 and as a Grand Slam winner with 2 titles in French Open (2012, 2014), an Australian Open (2008), a US [United States] Open (2006) and Wimbledon Open (2004). She won 36 singles titles and netted prize money of $ 38.8 million and the 3rd youngest player to conquer the All England Club’s hallowed grass courts.

  33. Question 33 of 50
    33. Question
    1 points
    Category: Current Affairs

    As per first edition of NCAER (National Council of Applied Economic Research) Land Records and Services Index (N-LRSI 2019-20), which is India’s best performing state in terms of digitising land records?

    Correct

    Answer – 4) Madhya Pradesh
    Explanation:
    According to the 1st edition of NCAER Land Records and Services Index (N-LRSI 2019-20) released by the National Council of Applied Economic Research (NCAER), Madhya Pradesh (MP) emerged as the best performing state in terms of digitising land records with the score of 74.9. It was followed by Odisha (67.5points) and Maharashtra (65.3 points). While Union Territory (UT) of Ladakh ranked at bottom at 33rd position with a score of 2.0.
    NCAER Land Record Services Index (N-LRSI) 2019-20 ranking:

    Rank State/Union Territory Score
    1 Madhya Pradesh 74.9
    2 Odisha 67.5
    3 Maharashtra 65.3
    33rd Ladakh 2
    Incorrect

    Answer – 4) Madhya Pradesh
    Explanation:
    According to the 1st edition of NCAER Land Records and Services Index (N-LRSI 2019-20) released by the National Council of Applied Economic Research (NCAER), Madhya Pradesh (MP) emerged as the best performing state in terms of digitising land records with the score of 74.9. It was followed by Odisha (67.5points) and Maharashtra (65.3 points). While Union Territory (UT) of Ladakh ranked at bottom at 33rd position with a score of 2.0.
    NCAER Land Record Services Index (N-LRSI) 2019-20 ranking:

    Rank State/Union Territory Score
    1 Madhya Pradesh 74.9
    2 Odisha 67.5
    3 Maharashtra 65.3
    33rd Ladakh 2

    Answer – 4) History
    Explanation:

  35. Question 35 of 50
    35. Question
    1 points
    Category: Current Affairs

    The National Science Day (NSD) in India celebrated annually on February 28. What is the Theme of NSD 2020?

    Correct

    Answer – 2) Theme: “Women in Science”
    Explanation:
    National Science Day (NSD) was observed all over India on Feb 28, 2020. This day marks the discovery of the Raman effect by Indian physicist Sir ChandraShekhara Venkata Raman (also called Sir C V Raman) on 28th February 1928 for which he was awarded the Nobel Prize in 1930. In 1986, the Government of India (GOI) declared Feb 28 as National Science Day. Theme of the NSD 2020: “Women in Science”.

    Incorrect

    Answer – 2) Theme: “Women in Science”
    Explanation:
    National Science Day (NSD) was observed all over India on Feb 28, 2020. This day marks the discovery of the Raman effect by Indian physicist Sir ChandraShekhara Venkata Raman (also called Sir C V Raman) on 28th February 1928 for which he was awarded the Nobel Prize in 1930. In 1986, the Government of India (GOI) declared Feb 28 as National Science Day. Theme of the NSD 2020: “Women in Science”.

    37. Question
    1 points
    Category: Current Affairs

    As per Government of India’s data, the issuance of RuPay debit cards under Pradhan Mantri Jan Dan Yojana (PMJDY) has reached the all-time-high of ______ (as on 19 February 2020).

    Correct

    Answer – 3) 29.14 crore
    Explanation:
    In accordance with the government data, by February 19, 2020, the issuance of RuPay debit cards under the Pradhan Mantri Jan Dhan Yojana (PMJDY) reached an all-time-high of 29.14 crore. The data states that three out of four Jan Dhan account holders (i.e 29.14 crore out of 38.13 crore – around 76%)have a RuPay debit card.

    Incorrect

    Answer – 3) 29.14 crore
    Explanation:
    In accordance with the government data, by February 19, 2020, the issuance of RuPay debit cards under the Pradhan Mantri Jan Dhan Yojana (PMJDY) reached an all-time-high of 29.14 crore. The data states that three out of four Jan Dhan account holders (i.e 29.14 crore out of 38.13 crore – around 76%)have a RuPay debit card.

  38. Question 38 of 50
    38. Question
    1 points
    Category: Current Affairs

    As per Controller General of Accounts (CGA), the fiscal deficit of the country reached ______ of the estimate for the whole year at the end of January 2020.

    Correct

    Answer – 4) 128.5%
    Explanation:
    According to the Controller General of Accounts (CGA) of Department of Expenditure, Ministry of Finance, fiscal deficit of the country reached 128.5 % of the estimate for the whole year at the end of January 2020.The deficit stood at Rs 9,85,472 crore ($137.05 billion). The deficit was 121.5% of the revised budget estimate (RBE) for the same period of the previous financial year-FY 2018-19.

    Incorrect

    Answer – 4) 128.5%
    Explanation:
    According to the Controller General of Accounts (CGA) of Department of Expenditure, Ministry of Finance, fiscal deficit of the country reached 128.5 % of the estimate for the whole year at the end of January 2020.The deficit stood at Rs 9,85,472 crore ($137.05 billion). The deficit was 121.5% of the revised budget estimate (RBE) for the same period of the previous financial year-FY 2018-19.

    Explanation:
    In accordance with the report by online payment processor Worldline India titled “Wordline India Digital Payments 2019”, Bengaluru (Karnataka) accounted for the highest number of digital transactions in India in 2019, followed by Chennai (Tamil Nadu), Mumbai and Pune in Maharashtra.

    Incorrect

    Answer – 3) Bengaluru
    Explanation:
    In accordance with the report by online payment processor Worldline India titled “Wordline India Digital Payments 2019”, Bengaluru (Karnataka) accounted for the highest number of digital transactions in India in 2019, followed by Chennai (Tamil Nadu), Mumbai and Pune in Maharashtra.

    Correct

    Answer – 2) Mumbai
    Explanation:

    Incorrect

    Answer – 2) Mumbai
    Explanation:
    Mumbai International Airport Limited (MIAL), a joint venture (JV) of the GVK led consortium and Airports Authority of India (AAI), has unveiled Chhatrapati Shivaji Maharaj International Airport as the world’s largest airport-based temperature-controlled facility, the ‘Export Cold Zone’ for processing and storage of agro and pharma products.

    Explanation:

    Category: Static GK

    Lonar lake, India’s only crater lake is located in which state/UT?

    Correct

    Answer – 4) Maharashtra
    Explanation:
    The Indian government proposed names of 10 more wetlands to be declared as sites of international importance under the Ramsar Convention. The new wetlands being proposed for inclusion are – Lonar from Maharashtra which is a unique wetland and the only Crater Lake in the country, a site from Bihar-Kanwar lake, two sites from Haryana which doesn’t have a Ramsar site till now –Sultanpur and Bhindawas. Uttarakhand also has sent a proposal for its first Ramsar site-Asan and the rest are from Uttar Pradesh.

    Incorrect

    Answer – 4) Maharashtra
    Explanation:
    The Indian government proposed names of 10 more wetlands to be declared as sites of international importance under the Ramsar Convention. The new wetlands being proposed for inclusion are – Lonar from Maharashtra which is a unique wetland and the only Crater Lake in the country, a site from Bihar-Kanwar lake, two sites from Haryana which doesn’t have a Ramsar site till now –Sultanpur and Bhindawas. Uttarakhand also has sent a proposal for its first Ramsar site-Asan and the rest are from Uttar Pradesh.

  45. Question 45 of 50
    45. Question
    1 points
    Category: Static GK

    Losar festival is celebrated in which Indian state?

    Correct

    Answer – 2) Himachal Pradesh
    Explanation:
    Losar festival was celebrated at Dharamshala, Himachal Pradesh. The festival is celebrated on the 1st day of the lunisolar Tibetan calendar also called Tibetan New Year. Losar is a festival in Tibetan Buddhism.

    Incorrect

    Answer – 2) Himachal Pradesh
    Explanation:
    Losar festival was celebrated at Dharamshala, Himachal Pradesh. The festival is celebrated on the 1st day of the lunisolar Tibetan calendar also called Tibetan New Year. Losar is a festival in Tibetan Buddhism.

  46. Question 46 of 50
    46. Question
    1 points
    Category: Static GK

    The Headquarters of Geological Survey of India (GSI) located at?

    Correct

    Answer – 3) Kolkata, West Bengal
    Explanation:
    On February 22, 2020 Geological Survey of India(GSI) has denied the discovery of gold deposits of over 3,000 tonnes and mentioned that the mineralised zone having an average grade of 3.03 grams per tonne of gold is tentative in nature and the total gold which can be extracted from the total resource of 52,806.25 tonnes of ore is approximately 160 kg and not 3,350 tonnes in Sonbhadra district of Uttar Pradesh.

    Incorrect

    Answer – 3) Kolkata, West Bengal
    Explanation:
    On February 22, 2020 Geological Survey of India(GSI) has denied the discovery of gold deposits of over 3,000 tonnes and mentioned that the mineralised zone having an average grade of 3.03 grams per tonne of gold is tentative in nature and the total gold which can be extracted from the total resource of 52,806.25 tonnes of ore is approximately 160 kg and not 3,350 tonnes in Sonbhadra district of Uttar Pradesh.

    Correct

    Incorrect

    Answer – 5) Karnataka
    Explanation:
    The Malai Mahadeshwara sanctuary will be renamed as Malai Mahadeshwara Hill Tiger Reserve (MMH TR) as per the request of National Tiger Conservation Authority (NCTA).

    Correct

    Answer – 2) Odisha
    Explanation:
    The population of endangered dolphins has come down by half (from 126 to 62) in Odisha’s Bhitarkanika National Park as per the Dolphin census report released on February 24, 2020.

    Incorrect

    Answer – 2) Odisha
    Explanation:
    The population of endangered dolphins has come down by half (from 126 to 62) in Odisha’s Bhitarkanika National Park as per the Dolphin census report released on February 24, 2020.

    Explanation:
    As per recent news, Bhopal’s Van Vihar National Park will get A tiger and a tigress (2 new tigers) from Bandhavgarh Tiger Reserve (BTR) in Madhya Pradesh.

    Incorrect

    Answer – 4) Madhya Pradesh
    Explanation:
    As per recent news, Bhopal’s Van Vihar National Park will get A tiger and a tigress (2 new tigers) from Bandhavgarh Tiger Reserve (BTR) in Madhya Pradesh.

  1. Question 1 of 50
    1. Question
    1 points
    Category: Current Affairs

    Who flagged of the Khadi and Village Industries Commission’s (KVIC) ‘Apiary on Wheels’ for bee keepers in New Delhi?

    Correct

    Answer – 4) Nitin Gadkari
    Explanation:
    Nitin Jairam Gadkari, the union minister for Ministry of Micro, Small and Medium Enterprises (MSME) flagged off ‘Apiary on Wheels’ in New Delhi in the presence of Shri Vinai Kumar Saxena, Chairman of Khadi and Village Industries Commission (KVIC). Apiary on Wheels is a unique concept for easy maintenance of BeeBox and migration of live colonies, designed by KVIC.

    Incorrect

    Answer – 4) Nitin Gadkari
    Explanation:
    Nitin Jairam Gadkari, the union minister for Ministry of Micro, Small and Medium Enterprises (MSME) flagged off ‘Apiary on Wheels’ in New Delhi in the presence of Shri Vinai Kumar Saxena, Chairman of Khadi and Village Industries Commission (KVIC). Apiary on Wheels is a unique concept for easy maintenance of BeeBox and migration of live colonies, designed by KVIC.

  2. Question 2 of 50
    2. Question
    1 points
    Category: Current Affairs

    The Government of India (GoI) to host the 3-day National organic food festival with the theme ‘Unleashing India’s organic market potential’ at which Indian State/UT?

    Correct

    Answer – 5) New Delhi
    Explanation:
    The Government of India (GOI) is to host the National Organic Food festival from February (21 to 23, 2020) at Jawaharlal Nehru Stadium, New Delhi, India. The festival will be inaugurated by Smt. Harsimrat Kaur Badal, Minister of Food Processing Industries (MoFPI). The 3-day festival is celebrated for the 1st time in order to boost organic products and to promote women entrepreneurship in the area of production & processing of organic products. Theme: Unleashing India’s Organic Market Potential.

    Incorrect

    Answer – 5) New Delhi
    Explanation:
    The Government of India (GOI) is to host the National Organic Food festival from February (21 to 23, 2020) at Jawaharlal Nehru Stadium, New Delhi, India. The festival will be inaugurated by Smt. Harsimrat Kaur Badal, Minister of Food Processing Industries (MoFPI). The 3-day festival is celebrated for the 1st time in order to boost organic products and to promote women entrepreneurship in the area of production & processing of organic products. Theme: Unleashing India’s Organic Market Potential.

  3. Question 3 of 50
    3. Question
    1 points
    Category: Current Affairs

    What was the Theme of 43rd International Fund for Agricultural Development (IFAD) council held at Rome, Italy on February 2020?

    Correct

    Answer – 2) Theme: “Investing in sustainable food systems to end hunger by 2030”
    Explanation:
    The IFAD’s 43rd Governing Council meeting was held in Rome, Italy on 11-12 February 2020 on the theme “Investing in sustainable food systems to end hunger by 2030”.

    Incorrect

    Answer – 2) Theme: “Investing in sustainable food systems to end hunger by 2030”
    Explanation:
    The IFAD’s 43rd Governing Council meeting was held in Rome, Italy on 11-12 February 2020 on the theme “Investing in sustainable food systems to end hunger by 2030”.

  4. Question 4 of 50
    4. Question
    1 points
    Category: Current Affairs

    The Securities and Exchange Board of India (SEBI) has constituted Municipal Bonds Development Committee to get recommendations on policy matters pertaining to development of municipal debt securities market. Who is the Head of Committee?

    Correct

    Answer – 5) Sujit Prasad
    Explanation:
    SEBI (Securities and Exchange Board of India) has constituted Municipal Bonds Development Committee headed by Shri Sujit Prasad, Executive Director, SEBI in order to get recommendations on policy matters pertaining to development of municipal debt securities market. The members of the committee include representatives from ministry, Municipal Corporation, lawyers, professionals and market practitioners.

    Incorrect

    Answer – 5) Sujit Prasad
    Explanation:
    SEBI (Securities and Exchange Board of India) has constituted Municipal Bonds Development Committee headed by Shri Sujit Prasad, Executive Director, SEBI in order to get recommendations on policy matters pertaining to development of municipal debt securities market. The members of the committee include representatives from ministry, Municipal Corporation, lawyers, professionals and market practitioners.

  5. Question 5 of 50
    5. Question
    1 points
    Category: Current Affairs

    According to International Institute for Strategic Studies’ (IISS) annual “Military Balance” report, what is rank of India among World’s biggest defence spenders?

    Correct

    Answer – 4) 5
    Explanation:
    The International Institute for Strategic Studies (IISS) annual “Military Balance” report states that global spending on defence hiked by 4% percent in 2019, showing largest growth in 10 years (2010-2019). The report showed top 15 countries, among them, the world’s biggest defence spenders are United States (US), China, Saudi Arabia, Russia and India.
    Table Showing Defence Spending of Top 10 Countries in 2019

    Rank Country Defence Spending (US$bn)
    1 United States 684.6
    2 China 181.1
    3 Saudi Arabia 78.4
    4 Russia 61.6
    5 India 60.5
    6 United Kingdom 54.8
    7 France 52.3
    8 Japan 48.6
    9 Germany 48.5
    10 South Korea 39.8
    Incorrect

    Answer – 4) 5
    Explanation:
    The International Institute for Strategic Studies (IISS) annual “Military Balance” report states that global spending on defence hiked by 4% percent in 2019, showing largest growth in 10 years (2010-2019). The report showed top 15 countries, among them, the world’s biggest defence spenders are United States (US), China, Saudi Arabia, Russia and India.
    Table Showing Defence Spending of Top 10 Countries in 2019

    Rank Country Defence Spending (US$bn)
    1 United States 684.6
    2 China 181.1
    3 Saudi Arabia 78.4
    4 Russia 61.6
    5 India 60.5
    6 United Kingdom 54.8
    7 France 52.3
    8 Japan 48.6
    9 Germany 48.5
    10 South Korea 39.8
  6. Question 6 of 50
    6. Question
    1 points
    Category: Current Affairs

    Which Indian State’s forest department & Wildlife Conservation Trust (WCT) has radio tagged Indian Pangolin for the first time in order to know its ecology and to develop conservation plan?

    Correct

    Answer – 5) Madhya Pradesh
    Explanation:
    The Madhya Pradesh (MP) forest department & Wildlife Conservation Trust (WCT) has radio-tagged an Indian Pangolin (Manis crassicaudata) for the first time in order to know its ecology and develop an effective conservation plan.

    Incorrect

    Answer – 5) Madhya Pradesh
    Explanation:
    The Madhya Pradesh (MP) forest department & Wildlife Conservation Trust (WCT) has radio-tagged an Indian Pangolin (Manis crassicaudata) for the first time in order to know its ecology and develop an effective conservation plan.

  7. Question 7 of 50
    7. Question
    1 points
    Category: Current Affairs

    In which Indian state the seed sowing festival ‘Lui-Ngai-Ni’ celebrated with the 2020’s theme “Oneness through culture”?

    Correct

    Answer – 3) Manipur
    Explanation:
    The Naga tribes of Manipur celebrated seed sowing festival ‘Lui-Ngai-Ni’ at Tangkhul Naga Long (TNL) ground in Ukhrul, Manipur. It is the second major inter-tribe Naga festival after Hornbill Festival, which is celebrated by more than ten Naga tribes of Nagaland.

    Incorrect

    Answer – 3) Manipur
    Explanation:
    The Naga tribes of Manipur celebrated seed sowing festival ‘Lui-Ngai-Ni’ at Tangkhul Naga Long (TNL) ground in Ukhrul, Manipur. It is the second major inter-tribe Naga festival after Hornbill Festival, which is celebrated by more than ten Naga tribes of Nagaland.

    1 points

    Which Indian State has announced Rs. 6 Crore cash reward for gold medal winners from the state at Tokyo Olympics 2020?

    Correct

    Answer – 5) Haryana
    Explanation:
    The Chief Minister of Haryana Manohar Lal Khattar has announced that the state government will provide Rs. 6 crores for the players who bagged gold medals, Rs. 4 crores for the silver medalist and Rs. 2.5 crores for the bronze medalists at the Olympics Games and also employment in Haryana Civil Service or Haryana Police service to the sportsperson.

    Incorrect

    Answer – 5) Haryana
    Explanation:
    The Chief Minister of Haryana Manohar Lal Khattar has announced that the state government will provide Rs. 6 crores for the players who bagged gold medals, Rs. 4 crores for the silver medalist and Rs. 2.5 crores for the bronze medalists at the Olympics Games and also employment in Haryana Civil Service or Haryana Police service to the sportsperson.

  9. Question 9 of 50
    9. Question
    1 points
    Category: Current Affairs

    Which is India’s 1st overnight journey private train inaugurated by Prime Minister Modi during his visit to Uttar Pradesh?

    Correct

    Answer – 2) Maha Kaal Express
    Explanation:
    Prime Minister Modi flagged off the IRCTC’s (Indian Railway Catering and Tourism Corporation) Maha Kaal Express through video link. The train will connect 3 Jyotirling Pilgrim Centres – Varanasi, Ujjain and Omkareshwar. This would be first overnight journey private train in the country. Every passenger travelling on the train will be covered with complimentary travel insurance of Rs 10 lakh. Facilities like security services, quality vegetarian food, bedrolls, and housekeeping services will also be available onboard. The Kashi Mahakal Express will run between Varanasi and Indore.

    Incorrect

    Answer – 2) Maha Kaal Express
    Explanation:
    Prime Minister Modi flagged off the IRCTC’s (Indian Railway Catering and Tourism Corporation) Maha Kaal Express through video link. The train will connect 3 Jyotirling Pilgrim Centres – Varanasi, Ujjain and Omkareshwar. This would be first overnight journey private train in the country. Every passenger travelling on the train will be covered with complimentary travel insurance of Rs 10 lakh. Facilities like security services, quality vegetarian food, bedrolls, and housekeeping services will also be available onboard. The Kashi Mahakal Express will run between Varanasi and Indore.

  10. Question 10 of 50
    10. Question
    1 points
    Category: Current Affairs

    American Credit rating agency Moody’s Investors Service has lowered the India’s Gross Domestic Product (GDP) growth estimate for Financial Year 2020 from 6.6% to ______?

    Correct

    Answer – 5) 5.4%
    Explanation:
    On February 17, 2020, Moody’s Investors Service, an American credit rating agency, has lowered India’s Gross Domestic Product (GDP) growth estimate for the current financial year (2019-20) to 5.4% from 6.6% and the next financial year (2020-21) growth rate estimate to 5.8% from 6.7%

    Incorrect

    Answer – 5) 5.4%
    Explanation:
    On February 17, 2020, Moody’s Investors Service, an American credit rating agency, has lowered India’s Gross Domestic Product (GDP) growth estimate for the current financial year (2019-20) to 5.4% from 6.6% and the next financial year (2020-21) growth rate estimate to 5.8% from 6.7%

    With which country India has signed Memorandum of Understanding (MoU) to develop a world class National Maritime Heritage Complex (NMHC) at Lothal, Gujarat?

    Correct

    Answer – 3) Portugal
    Explanation:
    During the Portugal’s president Mr Marcelo Rebelo de Sousa visit to India One of the MoU is to develop a world class National Maritime Heritage Complex (NMHC) at Lothal, Gujarat with the cooperation from the Republic of Portugal. It will pay the way for cooperation between the two countries for showcasing common Maritime Heritage.

    Incorrect

    Answer – 3) Portugal
    Explanation:
    During the Portugal’s president Mr Marcelo Rebelo de Sousa visit to India One of the MoU is to develop a world class National Maritime Heritage Complex (NMHC) at Lothal, Gujarat with the cooperation from the Republic of Portugal. It will pay the way for cooperation between the two countries for showcasing common Maritime Heritage.

    1 points

    Which Indian state government launched “Yodhavu” mobile app to combat drug abuse and its distribution?
