  1. Question 1 of 50
    1. Question
    1 points
    Category: Current Affairs

    Which Indian State flagged of India’s 1st of its kind ‘Fruit Train’ Carries a load of 980 metric tonnes of Bananas under brand name ‘Happy Bananas’ (January 2020)?

    Correct

    Answer – 4) Andhra Pradesh
    Explanation:
    India’s first of its kind fruit train was launched from Tadipatri Railway Station in Anantapur district & from Kadapa district of Andhra Pradesh. This is the first time an entire train carrying a load of 980 metric tonnes of locally grown bananas. The bananas will be exported under the brand name ‘Happy Bananas’. Guntakal Railway division (is one of the four divisions of South Coast Railway zone of the Indian Railways) has loaded bananas for export to West Asian countries from Tadipatri at very first time and also it has been sent to the Jawaharlal Nehru Port Trust (JNP)in Mumbai, Maharashtra from where it will be exported to Iran.

    Incorrect

    Answer – 4) Andhra Pradesh
    Explanation:
    India’s first of its kind fruit train was launched from Tadipatri Railway Station in Anantapur district & from Kadapa district of Andhra Pradesh. This is the first time an entire train carrying a load of 980 metric tonnes of locally grown bananas. The bananas will be exported under the brand name ‘Happy Bananas’. Guntakal Railway division (is one of the four divisions of South Coast Railway zone of the Indian Railways) has loaded bananas for export to West Asian countries from Tadipatri at very first time and also it has been sent to the Jawaharlal Nehru Port Trust (JNP)in Mumbai, Maharashtra from where it will be exported to Iran.

  2. Question 2 of 50
    2. Question
    1 points
    Category: Current Affairs

    Which is the 1st Indian State to launch doorstep Pension delivery scheme in February 2020?

    Correct

    Answer – 2) Andhra Pradesh
    Explanation:
    On February 01, 2020 the govt of Andhra Pradesh (AP) has launched a doorstep pension delivery scheme named YSR Pension Kanuka. Under the scheme various welfare pensions will be delivered to the pensioners. The old age pensioners age has also been reduced from 65 to 60 years. The beneficiaries will be delivered with the pension services through volunteers equipped with smartphones.

    Incorrect

    Answer – 2) Andhra Pradesh
    Explanation:
    On February 01, 2020 the govt of Andhra Pradesh (AP) has launched a doorstep pension delivery scheme named YSR Pension Kanuka. Under the scheme various welfare pensions will be delivered to the pensioners. The old age pensioners age has also been reduced from 65 to 60 years. The beneficiaries will be delivered with the pension services through volunteers equipped with smartphones.

  3. Question 3 of 50
    3. Question
    1 points
    Category: Current Affairs

    As per recently released Government Data (Scores given by MeitY) the Public Sector Banks which are rated as ‘Good’ in Digital Transactions in December 2019 is/are?

    Correct

    Answer – 5) Both 1) and 3)
    Explanation:
    According to recently released data by Government of India via Ministry of Electronics and Information Technology (Meity), State Bank of India (SBI) and Bank of Maharashtra (BoM) are the only Public Sector Banks where are rated as ‘Good’ in Digital Transactions with the score of 68 and 77 respectively. The Scores for an individual bank are given by MeitY. A total of 9 private banks and 2 payment banks received good ratings on digital transactions in December 2019.

    Incorrect

    Answer – 5) Both 1) and 3)
    Explanation:
    According to recently released data by Government of India via Ministry of Electronics and Information Technology (Meity), State Bank of India (SBI) and Bank of Maharashtra (BoM) are the only Public Sector Banks where are rated as ‘Good’ in Digital Transactions with the score of 68 and 77 respectively. The Scores for an individual bank are given by MeitY. A total of 9 private banks and 2 payment banks received good ratings on digital transactions in December 2019.

  4. Question 4 of 50
    4. Question
    1 points
    Category: Current Affairs

    Indian Origin Techie Arvind Krishna elected as Chief Executive officer (CEO) of which Information Technology giant company?

    Correct

    Answer – 2) International Business Machine (IBM)
    Explanation:
    Indian origin technology executive Arvind Krishna has been elected as Chief Executive Officer of American IT giant International Business Machines Corp (IBM) after a “world-class succession process” will be effective on April, becomes the third Indian to head US-based multinational company after Microsoft corporation chief Satya Nadella and Google CEO Sundar Pichai.

    Incorrect

    Answer – 2) International Business Machine (IBM)
    Explanation:
    Indian origin technology executive Arvind Krishna has been elected as Chief Executive Officer of American IT giant International Business Machines Corp (IBM) after a “world-class succession process” will be effective on April, becomes the third Indian to head US-based multinational company after Microsoft corporation chief Satya Nadella and Google CEO Sundar Pichai.

    Answer – 3) Central Board of Indirect Taxes and Customs (CBIC)

  6. Question 6 of 50
    6. Question
    1 points
    Category: Current Affairs

    Maharashtra’s Vidya Bal who died recently (in January 2020) is a?

    Correct

    Answer – 3) Social Activist
    Explanation:
    Maharashtra’s stalwart social activist, Marathi feminist writer and journalist vidya bal (83) passed away in Pune, Maharashtra. She had fought for gender equality for women and had expressed ‘socialist feminism’ through her own established magazines such as STREE(women) and MILOON SARYAJANI (All of us together) in 1989.

    Incorrect

    Answer – 3) Social Activist
    Explanation:
    Maharashtra’s stalwart social activist, Marathi feminist writer and journalist vidya bal (83) passed away in Pune, Maharashtra. She had fought for gender equality for women and had expressed ‘socialist feminism’ through her own established magazines such as STREE(women) and MILOON SARYAJANI (All of us together) in 1989.

  7. Question 7 of 50
    7. Question
    1 points
    Category: Current Affairs

    The 34th edition of Surajkund International Crafts mela was Inaugrated by President Ram Nath Govind in February 2020 (Feb 1-16, 2020). The Surajkund International Crafts mela the largest crafts fair in the world was conducted in which Indian State?

    Correct

    Answer – 3) Haryana
    Explanation:
    President of India Shri. Ram Nath Kovind inaugurated the 34th edition of Surajkund International Crafts Mela in Haryana. Surajkund International Crafts Mela the Largest crafts fair in the world will be held every year at Surajkund in Faridabad district, Haryana.

    Incorrect

    Answer – 3) Haryana
    Explanation:
    President of India Shri. Ram Nath Kovind inaugurated the 34th edition of Surajkund International Crafts Mela in Haryana. Surajkund International Crafts Mela the Largest crafts fair in the world will be held every year at Surajkund in Faridabad district, Haryana.

  8. Question 8 of 50
    8. Question
    1 points
    Category: Current Affairs

    Which nation has appointed Mohammed Tawfiq Allawi as their New Prime Minister in February 2020 he succeeds Adil Abdul-Mahdi?

    Correct

    Answer – 2) Iraq
    Explanation:
    On 3 February, 2020 Mohammed Tawfiq Allawi, 65 years old, was appointed as the Iraq’s new Prime Minister (PM) by its President Barhim Salih. He was the successor of Adil Abdul-Mahdi who resigned in November 2019 due to anti-government protests.

    Incorrect

    Answer – 2) Iraq
    Explanation:
    On 3 February, 2020 Mohammed Tawfiq Allawi, 65 years old, was appointed as the Iraq’s new Prime Minister (PM) by its President Barhim Salih. He was the successor of Adil Abdul-Mahdi who resigned in November 2019 due to anti-government protests.

  9. Question 9 of 50

    Who has been elected as President of Paralympic committee of India (February 2020)?

    Explanation:
    India’s lone woman Paralympic medalist Deepa Malik, from Haryana, was elected as President of the Paralympic Committee of India. He was the successor of the acting interim president Gursharan Singh.

    Incorrect

    Answer – 1) Deepa Malik
    Explanation:
    India’s lone woman Paralympic medalist Deepa Malik, from Haryana, was elected as President of the Paralympic Committee of India. He was the successor of the acting interim president Gursharan Singh.

  10. Question 10 of 50
    10. Question
    1 points
    Category: Current Affairs

    Which Company chosen as Most promising Brand (Gold Category) 2019 in 7th MSME excellence award in New Delhi Organized by Associated Chambers of Commerce and Industry of India (ASSOCHAM)?

    Correct

    Answer – 1) Amulya Mica
    Explanation:
    Amulya Mica (Purbanchal Laminates Pvt Ltd), spear-headed by its Managing Director Rakesh Agarwal, was chosen as the Most Promising Brand of the Year Award 2019, Gold Category during the 7th edition of the MSME Excellence Award. The award & summit was organized by the Associated Chambers of Commerce and Industry of India (ASSOCHAM) at Le Maiden in New Delhi.

    Incorrect

    Answer – 1) Amulya Mica
    Explanation:
    Amulya Mica (Purbanchal Laminates Pvt Ltd), spear-headed by its Managing Director Rakesh Agarwal, was chosen as the Most Promising Brand of the Year Award 2019, Gold Category during the 7th edition of the MSME Excellence Award. The award & summit was organized by the Associated Chambers of Commerce and Industry of India (ASSOCHAM) at Le Maiden in New Delhi.

  11. Question 11 of 50
    11. Question
    1 points
    Category: Current Affairs

    According to the recently released Counterpoint Research’s Market Monitor service report (January 2020), The Rank of India among smartphone market of the world is?

    Correct

    Answer – 2) 2
    Explanation:
    According to the recently released Counterpoint Research’s Market Monitor service report, India surpassed the United States(US) for the first time to become the 2nd largest smartphone market in the world and the list was topped by China. India recorded 158 million shipments in 2019 with 7% year-on-year growth which was mainly due to Chinese smartphone brands that were introduced.

    Incorrect

    Answer – 2) 2
    Explanation:
    According to the recently released Counterpoint Research’s Market Monitor service report, India surpassed the United States(US) for the first time to become the 2nd largest smartphone market in the world and the list was topped by China. India recorded 158 million shipments in 2019 with 7% year-on-year growth which was mainly due to Chinese smartphone brands that were introduced.

  12. Question 12 of 50

    1 points
    Category: Current Affairs

    The 36th edition of National Games going to held Panaji, Goa (20th October,2020 to 4th November, 2020). The State bird of Goa is the official Mascot for the event. Which is the State bird of Goa?

    Correct

    Answer – 2) Flame-Throated Bulbul
    Explanation:
    The Flame-Throated Bulbul or Rubigula bird the state bird for Goa, which is officially declared as the Mascot for the 36th National Games going to held in Panaji, Goa. It will be hosting the 36th National Games from 20th October,2020 to 4th November, 2020 there will be 37 sports events across 24 venues for the event. The next edition (37th) Edition of National Games is going to held in Chhattisgarh.

    Incorrect

    Answer – 2) Flame-Throated Bulbul
    Explanation:
    The Flame-Throated Bulbul or Rubigula bird the state bird for Goa, which is officially declared as the Mascot for the 36th National Games going to held in Panaji, Goa. It will be hosting the 36th National Games from 20th October,2020 to 4th November, 2020 there will be 37 sports events across 24 venues for the event. The next edition (37th) Edition of National Games is going to held in Chhattisgarh.

  14. Question 14 of 50
    14. Question
    1 points
    Category: Current Affairs

    The India’s biggest rural technical festival ‘Antapragnya 2020’ with the theme ‘Spot and encourage rural tech innovators’ held at which Indian State?

    Correct

    Answer – 3) Telangana
    Explanation:
    India’s biggest rural technical festival ‘Antahpragnya 2020’ was held in Rajiv Gandhi University of knowledge Technologies (RGUKT), Basar, Nirmal district, Telangana and the festival was inaugurated by M Prashanthi, District Collector of Nirmal, Telangana. The festival was held for 3 days from 31st January to February 1,2020. The theme for the year 2020 was “Spot and encourage rural tech innovators”. The festival displays 300 prototypes, working models, exhibits technologies such as automatic switch for water, homemade electricity, smoke absorber, automatic street lighting system, smart dustbins, zero budget farming, automatic irrigation etc.

    Incorrect

    Answer – 3) Telangana
    Explanation:
    India’s biggest rural technical festival ‘Antahpragnya 2020’ was held in Rajiv Gandhi University of knowledge Technologies (RGUKT), Basar, Nirmal district, Telangana and the festival was inaugurated by M Prashanthi, District Collector of Nirmal, Telangana. The festival was held for 3 days from 31st January to February 1,2020. The theme for the year 2020 was “Spot and encourage rural tech innovators”. The festival displays 300 prototypes, working models, exhibits technologies such as automatic switch for water, homemade electricity, smoke absorber, automatic street lighting system, smart dustbins, zero budget farming, automatic irrigation etc.

  15. Question 15 of 50
    15. Question
    1 points
    Category: Current Affairs

    Which Country has declared locusts as ‘National Emergency’ after the worst invasion of Locusts causing major damage to the crops, in addition to Pakistan?

    Correct

    Answer – 3) Somalia
    Explanation:
    The Government of Somalia announced a National Emergency on Locusts (family- Acrididae) attack because these insects caused major damage to the food supply in one of the world’s poorest countries & and most vulnerable regions in the world. Somalia is the 1st country to make such a declaration & its declaration aims to intensify the national effort to combat these insects. The Prime Minister (PM) of Pakistan Imran Khan has also declared a national emergency due to the massive locust’s attack. These locusts have destroyed entire crops in the Punjab province of Pakistan, which now needs Rs 730 crore to overcome this crisis.

    Incorrect

    Answer – 3) Somalia
    Explanation:
    The Government of Somalia announced a National Emergency on Locusts (family- Acrididae) attack because these insects caused major damage to the food supply in one of the world’s poorest countries & and most vulnerable regions in the world. Somalia is the 1st country to make such a declaration & its declaration aims to intensify the national effort to combat these insects. The Prime Minister (PM) of Pakistan Imran Khan has also declared a national emergency due to the massive locust’s attack. These locusts have destroyed entire crops in the Punjab province of Pakistan, which now needs Rs 730 crore to overcome this crisis.

    The Government has constituted a task force with the Group of Ministers (GoM) to monitor the novel coronavirus outbreak (February 2020). Who is the Head/Chairman of the task force?

    Correct

    Answer – 4) Harsh Vardhan
    Explanation:
    On February 03, 2020 the govt has set up a task force under the chairmanship of Union Minister for Health and Family Welfare (MoHFW) Dr Harsh Vardhan, to monitor the recent novel Coronavirus (nCoV) outbreak with the representatives from the Ministries of Health, Home, Civil Aviation and Women and Child Development (WCD). This announcement was made after a third positive case of nCoV was detected in the state of Kerala. The Group of Ministers(GoM) will review the situation on a daily basis.

    Incorrect

    Answer – 4) Harsh Vardhan
    Explanation:
    On February 03, 2020 the govt has set up a task force under the chairmanship of Union Minister for Health and Family Welfare (MoHFW) Dr Harsh Vardhan, to monitor the recent novel Coronavirus (nCoV) outbreak with the representatives from the Ministries of Health, Home, Civil Aviation and Women and Child Development (WCD). This announcement was made after a third positive case of nCoV was detected in the state of Kerala. The Group of Ministers(GoM) will review the situation on a daily basis.

  20. Question 20 of 50
    20. Question
    1 points
    Category: Current Affairs

    The World Cancer day (WCD) organized by Union for International Cancer Control (UICC) observed every year on February 4. The Theme WCD for 2019-21 is?

    Correct

    Answer – 2) Theme: “I am and I will”
    Explanation:
    The World Cancer Day is organized by the Union for International Cancer Control (UICC), Geneva, Switzerland, every year on February 4 to raise awareness to encourage cancer’s prevention, detection and treatment. The primary goal of World Cancer Day is to reduce the illness & death caused by cancer. The theme of WCD from 2019-21 is “I am and I will”. The theme highlights that all of us can fight against cancer.

    Incorrect

    Answer – 2) Theme: “I am and I will”
    Explanation:
    The World Cancer Day is organized by the Union for International Cancer Control (UICC), Geneva, Switzerland, every year on February 4 to raise awareness to encourage cancer’s prevention, detection and treatment. The primary goal of World Cancer Day is to reduce the illness & death caused by cancer. The theme of WCD from 2019-21 is “I am and I will”. The theme highlights that all of us can fight against cancer.

Yediyurappa, and the scheme will contain 53 services from 11 departments.

    Incorrect

    Answer – 4) Karnataka
    Explanation:

Yediyurappa, and the scheme will contain 53 services from 11 departments.

  22. Question 22 of 50
    22. Question
    1 points
    Category: Current Affairs

    Which country has ended free entry of Indian tourists (Feb 2020) and decided to implement daily fee of Rs. 1200 for regional tourists from India from July 2020?

    Correct

    Answer – 5) Bhutan
    Explanation:
    On February 5,2020 The Government of Bhutan, Thimphu decided to implement a daily fee of Rs.1200 ($17) for “regional tourists” from India, the Maldives, Bangladesh from July 2020. The fee is called SDF “Sustainable Development Fees” in order to regulate a new tourism policy (tourism facilities, better infrastructure).

    Incorrect

    Answer – 5) Bhutan
    Explanation:
    On February 5,2020 The Government of Bhutan, Thimphu decided to implement a daily fee of Rs.1200 ($17) for “regional tourists” from India, the Maldives, Bangladesh from July 2020. The fee is called SDF “Sustainable Development Fees” in order to regulate a new tourism policy (tourism facilities, better infrastructure).

    Explanation:

    Answer – 4) 38 Crore
    Explanation:

Around 31 crore accounts are operative out of total 38 crores accounts & the number of these accounts has increased every year since the launch of the scheme.

    Incorrect

    Answer – 4) 38 Crore

Around 31 crore accounts are operative out of total 38 crores accounts & the number of these accounts has increased every year since the launch of the scheme.

All members of the MPC unanimously voted to keeps repo rate unchanged at 5.15% to continue other rates are, Reverse repo – 4.90, Bank rate – 5.40%, Marginal standing Facility (MSF) – 5.40%.

    Incorrect

    Answer – 2) 4.90%
    Explanation:
    The Reserve Bank of India (RBI) announced its 6th Bi-Monthly Monetary Policy Rates for 2020-21 in Mumbai, Maharashtra. All members of the MPC unanimously voted to keeps repo rate unchanged at 5.15% to continue other rates are, Reverse repo – 4.90, Bank rate – 5.40%, Marginal standing Facility (MSF) – 5.40%.

    Answer – 4) 6.1
    Explanation:
    As per the new Periodic Labour Force Survey (PLFS) being conducted by the Ministry of Statistics and Programme Implementation (MosPI), the labour force participation is 36.9 % and the rate of unemployment for 2017-18 is 6.1%.

    Incorrect

    Answer – 4) 6.1
    Explanation:
    As per the new Periodic Labour Force Survey (PLFS) being conducted by the Ministry of Statistics and Programme Implementation (MosPI), the labour force participation is 36.9 % and the rate of unemployment for 2017-18 is 6.1%.

    According to Reserve Bank of India (RBI), the estimated Gross Domestic Product (GDP) growth rate for Financial Year 21 (FY21) is?

    Correct

    Answer – 4) 6%
    Explanation:
    The Reserve Bank has projected GDP (Gross Domestic Product) growth forecast for Fiscal Year-FY21 to 6%. It was 5% in FY20. In the Economic Survey presented on 31 January,2020 the GDP growth rate in 2020-21 has been estimated to be 6 – 6.5 %.

    Incorrect

    Answer – 4) 6%
    Explanation:
    The Reserve Bank has projected GDP (Gross Domestic Product) growth forecast for Fiscal Year-FY21 to 6%. It was 5% in FY20. In the Economic Survey presented on 31 January,2020 the GDP growth rate in 2020-21 has been estimated to be 6 – 6.5 %.

Kohli’s brand value has gone up to $237.5 million in 2019 with a jump of 39%. Bollywood Actor Akshay Kumar becomes the 2nd position with a brand value of $104.5 million.

    Incorrect

    Answer – 3) Virat Kohli
    Explanation:
    Duff & Phelps published the celebrity brand evaluation report for 2019. Indian Captain Virat Kohli has retained the top position for the third consecutive time. Kohli’s brand value has gone up to $237.5 million in 2019 with a jump of 39%. Bollywood Actor Akshay Kumar becomes the 2nd position with a brand value of $104.5 million.

  31. Question 31 of 50
    31. Question
    1 points
    Category: Current Affairs

    What is India’s Rank in the 8th edition of Intellectual Property Index named ‘Art of the Possible’ released by Chamber of Commerce’s Global Innovation Policy Center (GIPC) (Feb 2020)?

    Correct

    Answer – 3) 40
    Explanation:
    In 2020 GIPC’s IP Index, India’s position has downgraded to 40th rank in comparison to 36th position out of 50 countries in 2019. List was topped by United States of America.
    Among Asia, India is ranked 4th which is topped by Australia and followed by Brunei (2nd) and China (3rd).
    Among Lower-middle-income economies, India is at 2nd position which is topped by Egypt.

    Incorrect

    Answer – 3) 40
    Explanation:
    In 2020 GIPC’s IP Index, India’s position has downgraded to 40th rank in comparison to 36th position out of 50 countries in 2019. List was topped by United States of America.
    Among Asia, India is ranked 4th which is topped by Australia and followed by Brunei (2nd) and China (3rd).
    Among Lower-middle-income economies, India is at 2nd position which is topped by Egypt.

  33. Question 33 of 50
    33. Question
    1 points
    Category: Current Affairs

    Where is India’s 1st ever Glass floor bridge replacing iconic suspension bridge Lakshman Jhula?

    Correct

    Answer – 4) Uttarakhand
    Explanation:
    Uttarakhand government has cleared the design of a glass floor suspension bridge, the first of its kind in the country, to be built across Ganga River in Rishikesh, Uttarakhand as a replacement to iconic Lakshman Jhula which was closed in 2019 due to safety reasons. It has been in place for 94 years. The glass floor suspension bridge design is prepared by Public Works Department (PWD). It will be safe for commutation for at least 150 years.

    Incorrect

    Answer – 4) Uttarakhand
    Explanation:
    Uttarakhand government has cleared the design of a glass floor suspension bridge, the first of its kind in the country, to be built across Ganga River in Rishikesh, Uttarakhand as a replacement to iconic Lakshman Jhula which was closed in 2019 due to safety reasons. It has been in place for 94 years. The glass floor suspension bridge design is prepared by Public Works Department (PWD). It will be safe for commutation for at least 150 years.

    34. Question
    1 points
    Category: Current Affairs

    Which Indian city receives the UNESCO world heritage city certificate during the visit of General Audrey Azoulay Directorate General of UNESCO’s visit to India (Feb 2020)?

    Correct

    Answer – 3) Jaipur
    Explanation:
    General Audrey Azoulay Directorate General of UNESCO visited Pink City or walled city Jaipur, which in June 2019 became 38th World Heritage site in India. She presented the World Heritage City certificate to Minister of Urban Development Shanti Dhariwal. In 2017, Ahmedabad became the first city of India to get the World Heritage City tag.

    Incorrect

    Answer – 3) Jaipur
    Explanation:
    General Audrey Azoulay Directorate General of UNESCO visited Pink City or walled city Jaipur, which in June 2019 became 38th World Heritage site in India. She presented the World Heritage City certificate to Minister of Urban Development Shanti Dhariwal. In 2017, Ahmedabad became the first city of India to get the World Heritage City tag.

    Which country has announced the launch of 27 nation Religious Freedom Alliance (Feb 2020) for protecting and preserving the religious freedom across the world?

    Correct

    Answer – 4) U.S.
    Explanation:
    The United States (US) launched the 27-nation International Religious Freedom Alliance, which will try to adopt a collective approach in protecting and preserving religious freedom across the world. It was announced by US Secretary of State Michael Pompeo. Among the prominent countries to join the alliance are Austria, Brazil, the United Kingdom, Israel, Ukraine, the Netherlands and Greece.

    Incorrect

    Answer – 4) U.S.
    Explanation:
    The United States (US) launched the 27-nation International Religious Freedom Alliance, which will try to adopt a collective approach in protecting and preserving religious freedom across the world. It was announced by US Secretary of State Michael Pompeo. Among the prominent countries to join the alliance are Austria, Brazil, the United Kingdom, Israel, Ukraine, the Netherlands and Greece.

    Correct

    Answer – 1) $118.3 Billion
    Explanation:
    The Indian govt. has released data of remittances received in the country since April 2018- September 2019. As per the report around 13.62 million Indian nationals are staying abroad & around $118.3 billion has been received as remittance. As per data of the Reserve Bank of India(RBI), $76.4 billion was received as remittances during 2018-19 while $41.9 billion was received during 2019-20.

    Incorrect

    Answer – 1) $118.3 Billion
    Explanation:
    The Indian govt. has released data of remittances received in the country since April 2018- September 2019. As per the report around 13.62 million Indian nationals are staying abroad & around $118.3 billion has been received as remittance. As per data of the Reserve Bank of India(RBI), $76.4 billion was received as remittances during 2018-19 while $41.9 billion was received during 2019-20.

    Answer – 2) Bharti Airtel

  40. Question 40 of 50
    40. Question
    1 points
    Category: Current Affairs

    Nasa Astronaut who returns (Feb 2020) to earth after record long stay in International Space Station (ISS) is?

    Correct

    Answer – 3) Christina Koch
    Explanation:
    Valeri NASA’s (National Aeronautics and Space Administration) astronaut Christina Koch (41 years) from United States(US)who made the 1st all female space walk in 2019 landed in Kazakh desert steppe of Kazakhstan in a Soyuz MS-13 capsule. She has landed after making a record of longest stay on the International Space Station(ISS). She made her landing after ending a 328 mission in space. Koch broke the record of NASA’s Peggy Whitson for the longest continuous stay in space by a woman.

    Incorrect

    Answer – 3) Christina Koch
    Explanation:
    Valeri NASA’s (National Aeronautics and Space Administration) astronaut Christina Koch (41 years) from United States(US)who made the 1st all female space walk in 2019 landed in Kazakh desert steppe of Kazakhstan in a Soyuz MS-13 capsule. She has landed after making a record of longest stay on the International Space Station(ISS). She made her landing after ending a 328 mission in space. Koch broke the record of NASA’s Peggy Whitson for the longest continuous stay in space by a woman.

  41. Question 41 of 50

    Explanation:
    India Jumps up 79 positions in World Bank Doing Business Rankings, Improving from 142 In 2014 To 63 in 2019.

    Incorrect

    Answer – 4) 79
    Explanation:
    India Jumps up 79 positions in World Bank Doing Business Rankings, Improving from 142 In 2014 To 63 in 2019.

This comes days after GMR Airports signed an agreement earlier this week to operate and maintain the civilian enclave at Bidar airport under the Udan, or Ude Desh ka Aam Nagrik, regional connectivity scheme.

Ibrahim Mohamed Solih, President of the Maldives announced that Maldives has once again become a member of the Commonwealth family after the meeting between Abdullah Shahid, Foreign Minister of Maldives & Patricia Scotland, Secretary General of the Commonwealth.

    Explanation:
    The Maldives became the 54th family member of the Commonwealth family.   50. Question 50 of 50
    50. Question
    1 points
    Category: Static GK

    The river Matla flows in Which Indian state?

    Correct

    Answer – 1) West Bengal
    Explanation:
    Indian Navy, the naval branch of the Indian Armed Forces, has carried out a 5-day long coastal security exercise called, ‘Matla Abhiyaan’ at Sunderbans region in Kolkata, West Bengal. The exercise, named after Matla River, witnessed the 2 naval boats Flagged in’ at the ‘Man of War Jetty’ & carrying out a passage from Kolkata to Hemnagar (Both in West Bengal) via the international trade protocol route between India-Bangladesh.

    Incorrect

    Answer – 1) West Bengal
    Explanation:
    Indian Navy, the naval branch of the Indian Armed Forces, has carried out a 5-day long coastal security exercise called, ‘Matla Abhiyaan’ at Sunderbans region in Kolkata, West Bengal. The exercise, named after Matla River, witnessed the 2 naval boats Flagged in’ at the ‘Man of War Jetty’ & carrying out a passage from Kolkata to Hemnagar (Both in West Bengal) via the international trade protocol route between India-Bangladesh.

---
  1. Question 1 of 50
    1. Question
    1 points
    Category: Current Affairs

    Where did, East Coast Railway (ECoR) commissioned Indian Railways 1st & India’s 4th waste to energy plant ?

    Correct

    Answer-4) Bhubaneswar, Odisha
    Explanation:
    On January 22, 2020 Railway Board Member (Rolling Stock) Rajesh Agarwal inaugurated the East Coast Railway’s (ECoR) waste to energy plant at Mancheswar Carriage Repair workshop in Bhubaneswar, Odisha. It is the fourth waste to energy plant in the country and first plant manufactured by Indian Railways (IR).Total cost of the plant is Rs 1.79 crore and it can convert 500kg waste to light diesel oil which can be used in light furnaces.

    Incorrect

    Answer-4) Bhubaneswar, Odisha
    Explanation:
    On January 22, 2020 Railway Board Member (Rolling Stock) Rajesh Agarwal inaugurated the East Coast Railway’s (ECoR) waste to energy plant at Mancheswar Carriage Repair workshop in Bhubaneswar, Odisha. It is the fourth waste to energy plant in the country and first plant manufactured by Indian Railways (IR).Total cost of the plant is Rs 1.79 crore and it can convert 500kg waste to light diesel oil which can be used in light furnaces.

  2. Question 2 of 50
    2. Question
    1 points
    Category: Current Affairs

    In which city, government of India will set up India’s 1st war memorial for service animals such as dogs, horses, mules ?

    Correct

    Answer-5) Meerut, Uttar Pradesh(UP)
    Explanation:
    On January 23, 2020 the govt has announced to set up country’s 1st war memorial for service animals such as dogs, horses, mules in Meerut, Uttar Pradesh(UP). This war memorial will come at army’s specialised breeding, rearing training centre for animals in the Remount and Veterinary Corps (RVC) Centre and College in Meerut. Names of 300 dogs, 350 handlers and a few horses mules that had dedicated its life in various military operations like kargil war etc will be inscribed in the granite tablets in the memorial. Mansi, a labrador breed dog which was awarded the highest honour of animals will top the list of animals to be remembered.The Indian currently has army has more than 100 dogs, 5000 mules and 1500 horses.

    Incorrect

    Answer-5) Meerut, Uttar Pradesh(UP)
    Explanation:
    On January 23, 2020 the govt has announced to set up country’s 1st war memorial for service animals such as dogs, horses, mules in Meerut, Uttar Pradesh(UP). This war memorial will come at army’s specialised breeding, rearing training centre for animals in the Remount and Veterinary Corps (RVC) Centre and College in Meerut. Names of 300 dogs, 350 handlers and a few horses mules that had dedicated its life in various military operations like kargil war etc will be inscribed in the granite tablets in the memorial. Mansi, a labrador breed dog which was awarded the highest honour of animals will top the list of animals to be remembered.The Indian currently has army has more than 100 dogs, 5000 mules and 1500 horses.

  3. Question 3 of 50
    3. Question
    1 points
    Category: Current Affairs

    Which country minted the world’s smallest gold coin of 2.96 millimeter (0.12 inches), that features a face of scientist Albert Einstein sticking out his tongue ?

    Correct

    Answer-3) Switzerland
    Explanation:
    On January 23,2020 Switzerland state-owned Swissmint has minted World’s smallest gold coin of 2.96 millimeter (0.12 inches). The coin features a face of scientist Albert Einstein sticking out his tongue. It weighs 0.063 grams (1/500 th of an ounce) and has a nominal value of 1/4 Swiss francs (USD United States Dollar- 0.26).Its weight is comparable to that of 2 grains of rice.Swissmint has minted 999 coins which will be sold for 199 francs with a special magnifying glass to see Einstein’s face.

    Incorrect

    Answer-3) Switzerland
    Explanation:
    On January 23,2020 Switzerland state-owned Swissmint has minted World’s smallest gold coin of 2.96 millimeter (0.12 inches). The coin features a face of scientist Albert Einstein sticking out his tongue. It weighs 0.063 grams (1/500 th of an ounce) and has a nominal value of 1/4 Swiss francs (USD United States Dollar- 0.26).Its weight is comparable to that of 2 grains of rice.Swissmint has minted 999 coins which will be sold for 199 francs with a special magnifying glass to see Einstein’s face.

  4. Question 4 of 50
    4. Question
    1 points
    Category: Current Affairs

    What is the maximum voluntary investment limit that can invested by the Foreign Portfolio Investors (FPIs) through the Voluntary Retention Route (VRR) ?

    Correct

    Answer-4) Rs 1,50,000 crore
    Explanation:
    RBI also doubled the voluntary investment limit for FPIs through the voluntary retention route (VRR). Now FPIs can invest up to Rs 1,50,000 crore through VRR as against the earlier limit of Rs 75,000 crore. The minimum retention period should be 3 years. As on December 31,2019, about Rs 54,300 crore has already been invested under the scheme. After increasing the limit under the scheme, now Rs.90630 crores can be invested in it.

    Incorrect

    Answer-4) Rs 1,50,000 crore
    Explanation:
    RBI also doubled the voluntary investment limit for FPIs through the voluntary retention route (VRR). Now FPIs can invest up to Rs 1,50,000 crore through VRR as against the earlier limit of Rs 75,000 crore. The minimum retention period should be 3 years. As on December 31,2019, about Rs 54,300 crore has already been invested under the scheme. After increasing the limit under the scheme, now Rs.90630 crores can be invested in it.

  5. Question 5 of 50
    5. Question
    1 points
    Category: Current Affairs

    Which bank has launched India’s 1st multilingual voice-enabled mobile banking application ‘All-In-One’ using which users can communicate with the chat–bot ‘Ask Lakshmi’ for their general banking queries ?

    Correct

    Answer-2) City Union Bank (CUB)
    Explanation:
    On January 22, 2020, For the 1st time India, the City Union Bank (CUB) Limited , one of the leading Indian banks in India, has launched a multilingual voice-enabled mobile banking application. Now the CUB customers can converse with the chat–bot ‘Ask Lakshmi’ of the app in Tamil, English, Hindi / Telugu language for their general banking queries including transactions like Balance enquiry, mini statement, fund transfer over voice/text instructions.

    Incorrect

    Answer-2) City Union Bank (CUB)
    Explanation:
    On January 22, 2020, For the 1st time India, the City Union Bank (CUB) Limited , one of the leading Indian banks in India, has launched a multilingual voice-enabled mobile banking application. Now the CUB customers can converse with the chat–bot ‘Ask Lakshmi’ of the app in Tamil, English, Hindi / Telugu language for their general banking queries including transactions like Balance enquiry, mini statement, fund transfer over voice/text instructions.

  6. Question 6 of 50
    6. Question
    1 points
    Category: Current Affairs

    Name the bank that has decided to convert into a Small Finance Bank (SFB) under Voluntary Transition of Primary (Urban) Co-operative Banks (UCBs) into SFB .

    Correct

    Answer-5) New India Co-operative Bank (NICB)
    Explanation:
    On January 20, 2020 the New India Co-operative Bank (NICB) has been decided to be converted into a Small Finance Bank (SFB) after being agreed by its shareholders under Voluntary Transition of Primary (Urban) Co-operative Banks (UCBs) into SFB. NICB will now approach the Reserve Bank of India(RBI) and Central Registrar of Societies for further action.

    Incorrect

    Answer-5) New India Co-operative Bank (NICB)
    Explanation:
    On January 20, 2020 the New India Co-operative Bank (NICB) has been decided to be converted into a Small Finance Bank (SFB) after being agreed by its shareholders under Voluntary Transition of Primary (Urban) Co-operative Banks (UCBs) into SFB. NICB will now approach the Reserve Bank of India(RBI) and Central Registrar of Societies for further action.

  7. Question 7 of 50
    7. Question
    1 points
    Category: Current Affairs

    Which 2 countries have signed an agreement to upgrade the 50.58 kilometer long Ashuganj-Akhaura road into a 4-lane highway ?

    Correct

    Answer-5) India and Bangladesh
    Explanation:
    On January 24, 2020 India and Bangladesh have signed an agreement to upgrade the 50.58 kilometer long Ashuganj-Akhaura road into a 4-lane highway. The road runs between Ashuganj river port and the Akhaura land port in Bangladesh. The road project is part of the $2 billion second Line of Credit(LoC) extended by India to Bangladesh in 2016. Roads and Highways Department (RHD) of Bangladesh and Afcons Infrastructure Limited of India will upgrade 39 km long road between Ashuganj river port to Dharhar area of Chattisgarh.The work to upgrade the remaining part of the road will be from Dharhar to Akhaura will be done by the RHS and an India-Bangladesh joint venture(JV).

    Incorrect

    Answer-5) India and Bangladesh
    Explanation:
    On January 24, 2020 India and Bangladesh have signed an agreement to upgrade the 50.58 kilometer long Ashuganj-Akhaura road into a 4-lane highway. The road runs between Ashuganj river port and the Akhaura land port in Bangladesh. The road project is part of the $2 billion second Line of Credit(LoC) extended by India to Bangladesh in 2016. Roads and Highways Department (RHD) of Bangladesh and Afcons Infrastructure Limited of India will upgrade 39 km long road between Ashuganj river port to Dharhar area of Chattisgarh.The work to upgrade the remaining part of the road will be from Dharhar to Akhaura will be done by the RHS and an India-Bangladesh joint venture(JV).

  8. Question 8 of 50
    8. Question
    1 points
    Category: Current Affairs

    Who was appointed as the panel member of the Advisory Board for Banking Frauds (ABBF) of Central Vigilance Commission (CVC) on January 24, 2020 ?

    Correct

    Answer-3) A.D.M Chavali
    Explanation:
    On January 24, 2020 the Central Vigilance Commission(CVC) has appointed former Indian Overseas Bank(IOB) Executive Director as A.D.M Chavali as its new panel member of the Advisory Board for Banking Frauds (ABBF) and will serve the board till August 20, 2021. Board aim: The board headed by T.M Bhasin former Vigilance Commissioner and former Chairman-cum-Managing Director of the Indian Bank(IB), was formed in 2019 and aims to conduct examination of allegations against officials in General Managers (GM) ranking involved in fraud cases of worth above Rs.50 crores.

    Incorrect

    Answer-3) A.D.M Chavali
    Explanation:
    On January 24, 2020 the Central Vigilance Commission(CVC) has appointed former Indian Overseas Bank(IOB) Executive Director as A.D.M Chavali as its new panel member of the Advisory Board for Banking Frauds (ABBF) and will serve the board till August 20, 2021. Board aim: The board headed by T.M Bhasin former Vigilance Commissioner and former Chairman-cum-Managing Director of the Indian Bank(IB), was formed in 2019 and aims to conduct examination of allegations against officials in General Managers (GM) ranking involved in fraud cases of worth above Rs.50 crores.

  9. Question 9 of 50
    9. Question
    1 points
    Category: Current Affairs

    Who will chair the Group of Ministers (GoM) constituted by the government of India to handle the disposal of enemy properties & to raise money from them ?

    Correct

    Answer-4) Amit Shah
    Explanation:
    On January 22, 2020, The Union government has decided to form 3 high-level steering committees to handle the disposal of enemy properties present in the country and to raise money from them.Group of Ministers (GoM) It will be headed by Union Home Minister(HM) Amit Shah, to oversee the disposal of more than 9,400 enemy properties in India, which are expected to bring in revenue of about Rs.1 lakh crore rupees to the exchequer. Inter-Ministerial Group will be co-chaired by the Union Home Secretary -Ajay Bhalla and Shri Tuhin Kanta Pandey, the secretary of the department of investment and public asset management (DIPAM).Core Group of Secretaries on Asset Monetisation (CGAM)will be constituted under the chairmanship of the Cabinet Secretary Rajiv Gauba.

    Incorrect

    Answer-4) Amit Shah
    Explanation:
    On January 22, 2020, The Union government has decided to form 3 high-level steering committees to handle the disposal of enemy properties present in the country and to raise money from them.Group of Ministers (GoM) It will be headed by Union Home Minister(HM) Amit Shah, to oversee the disposal of more than 9,400 enemy properties in India, which are expected to bring in revenue of about Rs.1 lakh crore rupees to the exchequer. Inter-Ministerial Group will be co-chaired by the Union Home Secretary -Ajay Bhalla and Shri Tuhin Kanta Pandey, the secretary of the department of investment and public asset management (DIPAM).Core Group of Secretaries on Asset Monetisation (CGAM)will be constituted under the chairmanship of the Cabinet Secretary Rajiv Gauba.

  10. Question 10 of 50
    10. Question
    1 points
    Category: Current Affairs

    What is the rank of India in the Transparency International’s Corruption Perception Index 2019 ?

    Correct

    Answer-3) 80th
    Explanation:
    The Corruption Perception Index 2019 was released by Transparency International. As per the Index India ranks 80 out of 180 countries with a score of 41 out of 100. Last year India’s rank was 78 with the same score. Least ranked countries: Somalia at 180 which followed by South Sudan at 179 and Syria at 178. These countries are followed by Yemen, Venezuela, Sudan, Equatorial Guinea and Afghanistan.Pakistan ranks 87 in the list whereas China ranks 117 among the 180 countries respectively.United States of America (USA) ranks 23rd with a score of 69.

    Incorrect

    Answer-3) 80th
    Explanation:
    The Corruption Perception Index 2019 was released by Transparency International. As per the Index India ranks 80 out of 180 countries with a score of 41 out of 100. Last year India’s rank was 78 with the same score. Least ranked countries: Somalia at 180 which followed by South Sudan at 179 and Syria at 178. These countries are followed by Yemen, Venezuela, Sudan, Equatorial Guinea and Afghanistan.Pakistan ranks 87 in the list whereas China ranks 117 among the 180 countries respectively.United States of America (USA) ranks 23rd with a score of 69.

  11. Question 11 of 50
    11. Question
    1 points
    Category: Current Affairs

    Name the Indian Space Research Organisation (ISRO)’s half-humanoid robot, that is set for an unmanned trip into space before Astronauts .

    Correct

    Answer-4) Vyom Mitra (friend in Sky)
    Explanation:
    Vyom Mitra, designed & developed by the ISRO’s Inertial Systems Unit in Thiruvananthapuram (Kerala) in collaboration with Indian Institute of Science (IIsc) Bengaluru, Karnataka, is half-humanoid and its body stops at the torso (the part of the human body where the limbs are attached) and without legs. The robot can speak 2 languages (Hindi and English) & will be sent in a space capsule at the end of the year 2020 / early 2021 to study the zero-gravity conditions in which the astronauts respond to living outside earth.

    Incorrect

    Answer-4) Vyom Mitra (friend in Sky)
    Explanation:
    Vyom Mitra, designed & developed by the ISRO’s Inertial Systems Unit in Thiruvananthapuram (Kerala) in collaboration with Indian Institute of Science (IIsc) Bengaluru, Karnataka, is half-humanoid and its body stops at the torso (the part of the human body where the limbs are attached) and without legs. The robot can speak 2 languages (Hindi and English) & will be sent in a space capsule at the end of the year 2020 / early 2021 to study the zero-gravity conditions in which the astronauts respond to living outside earth.

  12. Question 12 of 50
    12. Question
    1 points
    Category: Current Affairs

    Which country will train the Indian flight surgeons for Gaganyaan mission ?

    Correct

    Answer-2) France
    Explanation:
    Indian flight surgeons are being trained in France to take care of the health of astronauts selected for the India’s ambitious space manned ‘Gaganyaan Mission’. 2-week training of these physicians is very important for the Gaganyaan project, which took three Indian astronauts to space in the year 2022. Indian Air Force physicians with expertise in aviation medicine will be responsible for the health of astronauts during and after the flight. Flight surgeon Brigitte Godard, associated with the European Space Agency, was in India in July and August 2019 to start training physicians and engineers.

    Incorrect

    Answer-2) France
    Explanation:
    Indian flight surgeons are being trained in France to take care of the health of astronauts selected for the India’s ambitious space manned ‘Gaganyaan Mission’. 2-week training of these physicians is very important for the Gaganyaan project, which took three Indian astronauts to space in the year 2022. Indian Air Force physicians with expertise in aviation medicine will be responsible for the health of astronauts during and after the flight. Flight surgeon Brigitte Godard, associated with the European Space Agency, was in India in July and August 2019 to start training physicians and engineers.

  13. Question 13 of 50
    13. Question
    1 points
    Category: Current Affairs

    Where was the India’s first e-waste clinic inaugurated ?

    Correct

    Answer-1) Bhopal, Madhya Pradesh
    Explanation:
    On January 24,2020 India’s first e-waste clinic was opened in Bhopal, Madhya Pradesh. The e-waste clinic was inaugurated by C K Mishra (Secretary to the Ministry of Environment, Forest & Climate change,MoEFCC). The e-waste clinic was jointly set up by the Central Pollution Board Control -CPCB and Bhopal Municipal Corporation -BMC.

    Incorrect

    Answer-1) Bhopal, Madhya Pradesh
    Explanation:
    On January 24,2020 India’s first e-waste clinic was opened in Bhopal, Madhya Pradesh. The e-waste clinic was inaugurated by C K Mishra (Secretary to the Ministry of Environment, Forest & Climate change,MoEFCC). The e-waste clinic was jointly set up by the Central Pollution Board Control -CPCB and Bhopal Municipal Corporation -BMC.

  14. Question 14 of 50
    14. Question
    1 points
    Category: Current Affairs

    Under which organization assistance, Ministry of Women and Child Development launched “Establishment of Chairs in the Universities in the name of eminent women” to inspire women to achieve their goals ?

    Correct

    Answer-4) University Grants Commission (UGC)
    Explanation:
    January 24, 2020 is celebrated as the “National Girl Child Day” under the Ministry of Women and Child Development. The Ministry announced an initiative called “Establishment of Chairs in the Universities in the name of eminent women” which encourages women to carry out research activities.This initiative was launched under the assistance of University Grants Commission (UGC) to inspire women to achieve their goals and to motivate young girls towards higher studies.

    Incorrect

    Answer-4) University Grants Commission (UGC)
    Explanation:
    January 24, 2020 is celebrated as the “National Girl Child Day” under the Ministry of Women and Child Development. The Ministry announced an initiative called “Establishment of Chairs in the Universities in the name of eminent women” which encourages women to carry out research activities.This initiative was launched under the assistance of University Grants Commission (UGC) to inspire women to achieve their goals and to motivate young girls towards higher studies.

  15. Question 15 of 50
    15. Question
    1 points
    Category: Current Affairs

    Which bank has signed a loan agreement of $210 million for Maharashtra’s Agribusiness & rural transformation project ?

    Correct

    Answer-1) World Bank (WB)
    Explanation:
    On January 24, 2020 the govt of India, Govt of Maharashtra and the World Bank(WB) signed a loan agreement of $210 million for Maharashtra’s Agribusiness & rural transformation project. This project will help the farmers in Maharashtra to take part in competitive agriculture value chains, enhance agribusiness investments thereby increasing productivity of commodities. All 36 districts of Maharashtra will be implemented with the project and would benefit nearly 1 million farming households.

    Incorrect

    Answer-1) World Bank (WB)
    Explanation:
    On January 24, 2020 the govt of India, Govt of Maharashtra and the World Bank(WB) signed a loan agreement of $210 million for Maharashtra’s Agribusiness & rural transformation project. This project will help the farmers in Maharashtra to take part in competitive agriculture value chains, enhance agribusiness investments thereby increasing productivity of commodities. All 36 districts of Maharashtra will be implemented with the project and would benefit nearly 1 million farming households.

    1 points
    Category: Current Affairs

    Who was elected as the new Chair of the Forum of the Election Management Bodies of South Asia (FEMBoSA) for the year 2020 ?

    Correct

    Explanation:
    On January 24, 2020 India’s Chief Election Commissioner (CEC) Sunil Arora took over as the new Chair of the Forum of the Election Management Bodies of South Asia (FEMBoSA) for the year 2020. Sunil Arora succeeds K.M. Nural Huda, CEC of Bangladesh.

    Incorrect

    Answer-5) Sunil Arora
    Explanation:
    On January 24, 2020 India’s Chief Election Commissioner (CEC) Sunil Arora took over as the new Chair of the Forum of the Election Management Bodies of South Asia (FEMBoSA) for the year 2020. Sunil Arora succeeds K.M. Nural Huda, CEC of Bangladesh.

  17. Question 17 of 50
    17. Question
    1 points
    Category: Current Affairs

    What is the theme of the 50th edition of the 2020 World Economic Forum (WEF) annual meeting that held in Davos-Klosters, Switzerland ?

    Correct

    Answer-2) Theme – “Stakeholders for a Cohesive and Sustainable World”
    Explanation:
    The 50th edition of the 2020 World Economic Forum (WEF) annual meeting was held in Davos-Klosters,in Switzerland from January 21-24, 2020. The theme for the year 2020 was “Stakeholders for a Cohesive and Sustainable World”. The WEF summit aims to engage world leaders to collaborate for global, regional and industrial development etc. The Indian delegation to the WEF summit was led by Union Minister of Commerce (MoC) Shri Piyush Goyal. Shri Goyal also participated in an informal WTO (World Trade Organization) ministerial gathering.He also held a meeting with CEO (Chief Executive Officers) of companies, attended round table conferences on ‘Accelerating Investments in Indian Railways’.

    Incorrect

    Answer-2) Theme – “Stakeholders for a Cohesive and Sustainable World”
    Explanation:
    The 50th edition of the 2020 World Economic Forum (WEF) annual meeting was held in Davos-Klosters,in Switzerland from January 21-24, 2020. The theme for the year 2020 was “Stakeholders for a Cohesive and Sustainable World”. The WEF summit aims to engage world leaders to collaborate for global, regional and industrial development etc. The Indian delegation to the WEF summit was led by Union Minister of Commerce (MoC) Shri Piyush Goyal. Shri Goyal also participated in an informal WTO (World Trade Organization) ministerial gathering.He also held a meeting with CEO (Chief Executive Officers) of companies, attended round table conferences on ‘Accelerating Investments in Indian Railways’.

  18. Question 18 of 50
    18. Question
    1 points
    Category: Current Affairs

    Which country launched the Nuclear-capable surface-to-surface ballistic missile(SSBM) ‘Ghaznavi’ with strike range 290 km (kilometers) recently ?

    Correct

    Answer-1) Pakistan
    Explanation:
    On January 23,2020 The successful training launch of nuclear-capable surface-to-surface ballistic missile(SSBM) ‘Ghaznavi’ was held in Islamabad, Pakistan.The Ghaznavi missile strike targets upto a range of 290 km (kilometers).Inter-Services Public Relations (ISPR), media wing of the Pakistan’s army mentioned that the Training launch was part of Field Training Exercise of Army Strategic Forces Command.

    Incorrect

    Answer-1) Pakistan
    Explanation:
    On January 23,2020 The successful training launch of nuclear-capable surface-to-surface ballistic missile(SSBM) ‘Ghaznavi’ was held in Islamabad, Pakistan.The Ghaznavi missile strike targets upto a range of 290 km (kilometers).Inter-Services Public Relations (ISPR), media wing of the Pakistan’s army mentioned that the Training launch was part of Field Training Exercise of Army Strategic Forces Command.

  19. Question 19 of 50
    19. Question
    1 points
    Category: Current Affairs

    Name the country that has completely phased out of the Hydrochlorofluorocarbon (HCFC)-141 b, one of the most potent ozone depleting chemical .

    Correct

    Answer-1) India
    Explanation:
    The republic of India has successfully achieved complete phase out of the Hydrochlorofluorocarbon (HCFC)-141 b. It is a chemical used in foam manufacturing companies and is one of the most potent ozone depleting chemicals after the Chlorofluorocarbons (CFCs). India took the challenge to phase out HCFC-141b by January 1, 2020. HCFC 141b:Act to prohibit usage of HCFC-141b: The Ministry of Environment, Forest and Climate Change (MoEFCC) issued a notification for the prohibition of HCFC-141b from Jan 1st, 2020 under the Ozone Depleting Substances (Regulation and Control) Amendment Rules, 2019 issued under the Environment (Protection) Act, 1986.This was achieved through the ministry’s HCFC Phase out Management Plan (HPMP).

    Incorrect

    Answer-1) India
    Explanation:
    The republic of India has successfully achieved complete phase out of the Hydrochlorofluorocarbon (HCFC)-141 b. It is a chemical used in foam manufacturing companies and is one of the most potent ozone depleting chemicals after the Chlorofluorocarbons (CFCs). India took the challenge to phase out HCFC-141b by January 1, 2020. HCFC 141b:Act to prohibit usage of HCFC-141b: The Ministry of Environment, Forest and Climate Change (MoEFCC) issued a notification for the prohibition of HCFC-141b from Jan 1st, 2020 under the Ozone Depleting Substances (Regulation and Control) Amendment Rules, 2019 issued under the Environment (Protection) Act, 1986.This was achieved through the ministry’s HCFC Phase out Management Plan (HPMP).

  20. Question 20 of 50
    20. Question
    1 points
    Category: Current Affairs

    Name the scheme, launched by Maharashtra state govt with the aim of providing a meal to the poor for Rs.10 ?

    Correct

    Answer-3) Shiv Bhojan
    Explanation:
    On January 26, 2020, The Shiv Sena party led Maharashtra Government (govt) launched ‘Shiv Bhojan’ scheme, with the aim of providing a meal to the poor for Rs.10 on the occasion of the 71st Republic Day. The district guardian Minister Aslam Shaikh inaugurated the “Shiv Bhojan Thali” canteen at the civic-run Nair Hospital, Mumbai, Maharashtra. Aaditya Uddhav Thackeray, Tourism Minister, and Mumbai suburban district Guardian Minister inaugurated similar center at the Collector’s Office in Bandra, Maharashtra.

    Incorrect

    Answer-3) Shiv Bhojan
    Explanation:
    On January 26, 2020, The Shiv Sena party led Maharashtra Government (govt) launched ‘Shiv Bhojan’ scheme, with the aim of providing a meal to the poor for Rs.10 on the occasion of the 71st Republic Day. The district guardian Minister Aslam Shaikh inaugurated the “Shiv Bhojan Thali” canteen at the civic-run Nair Hospital, Mumbai, Maharashtra. Aaditya Uddhav Thackeray, Tourism Minister, and Mumbai suburban district Guardian Minister inaugurated similar center at the Collector’s Office in Bandra, Maharashtra.

Mehta will replace VG Kannan, who resigned from office as chief executive of IBA on December 31, 2019.

    Incorrect

    Answer-3) Sunil Mehta
    Explanation:
    On January 27, 2020, Former managing director (MD) and chief executive officer(CEO) of Punjab National Bank (PNB), Sunil Mehta, took over as the Chief Executive Officer (CEO) of the Indian Banks’ Association (IBA). Mehta will replace VG Kannan, who resigned from office as chief executive of IBA on December 31, 2019.

    Correct

    Answer-5) United States of America (USA)
    Explanation:
    On January 26,2020 the American basketball legend Kobe Bean Bryant has died along with his 13-years-old daughter Gianna in a Sikorsky S-76 helicopter crash near Calabasas in Southern California. He was 41.Bryant is the fourth-leading scorer in National Basketball Association (NBA) history and selected to the all-star 18 times and earned a Most Valuable Player (MVP) award in 2008.

    Incorrect

    Answer-5) United States of America (USA)
    Explanation:
    On January 26,2020 the American basketball legend Kobe Bean Bryant has died along with his 13-years-old daughter Gianna in a Sikorsky S-76 helicopter crash near Calabasas in Southern California. He was 41.Bryant is the fourth-leading scorer in National Basketball Association (NBA) history and selected to the all-star 18 times and earned a Most Valuable Player (MVP) award in 2008.

  24. Question 24 of 50
    24. Question
    1 points
    Category: Current Affairs

    Who is the chief guest of the 71st Republic Day of India ?

    Correct

    Answer-5) Jair Messias Bolsonaro
    Explanation:
    The President of Brazil Jair Messias Bolsonaro was the chief guest for the Republic Day celebrations and attended the Parade ceremony at Rajpath in New Delhi along with Indian Prime Minister Shri Narendra Modi, President Ram Nath Kovind along with other leaders. It is the 1st visit of Bolsonaro after assuming his office in January 1, 2019. This is also the 3rd time a Brazilian president attended as a chief guest of the republic day. The last time a Brazilian President attended the ceremony was Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva (former Brazilian president) in 2004.

    Incorrect

    Answer-5) Jair Messias Bolsonaro
    Explanation:
    The President of Brazil Jair Messias Bolsonaro was the chief guest for the Republic Day celebrations and attended the Parade ceremony at Rajpath in New Delhi along with Indian Prime Minister Shri Narendra Modi, President Ram Nath Kovind along with other leaders. It is the 1st visit of Bolsonaro after assuming his office in January 1, 2019. This is also the 3rd time a Brazilian president attended as a chief guest of the republic day. The last time a Brazilian President attended the ceremony was Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva (former Brazilian president) in 2004.

  25. Question 25 of 50
    25. Question
    1 points
    Category: Current Affairs

    Name the artillery gun system, whose marching contingent took part for the 1st time in the Republic Day parade.

    Correct

    Answer-1) Dhanush
    Explanation:
    The artillery gun system Dhanush, short-span bridge system and a marching contingent of the Army Air Defence took part for the 1st time in the Republic Day parade.Newly-inducted helicopters Apache and Chinook were also showcased by India for the first time.Apart from the Dhanush gun system, K9-Vajra, the anti-satellite (A-SAT) test conducted under Mission Shakti, and Air Defence Tactical Control Radar (ADTCR) of the DRDO (Defence Research Development Organisation) were also part of the parade.

    Incorrect

    Answer-1) Dhanush
    Explanation:
    The artillery gun system Dhanush, short-span bridge system and a marching contingent of the Army Air Defence took part for the 1st time in the Republic Day parade.Newly-inducted helicopters Apache and Chinook were also showcased by India for the first time.Apart from the Dhanush gun system, K9-Vajra, the anti-satellite (A-SAT) test conducted under Mission Shakti, and Air Defence Tactical Control Radar (ADTCR) of the DRDO (Defence Research Development Organisation) were also part of the parade.

  26. Question 26 of 50
    26. Question
    1 points
    Category: Current Affairs

    India’s 1st underwater metro rail, that will run partly under Hooghly River will be completed in which Indian city by March 2022 ?

    Correct

    Answer-3) Kolkata
    Explanation:
    On January 28,2020 Kolkata Metro Rail Corporation (KMRC) is set to complete its East-West Project, which runs partly under the Hooghly river, West Bengal, by March 2022. It will be India’s first underwater metro. The new metro rail is expected to carry about 900,000 people daily & will take less than a minute to cross a 520-meter underwater tunnel. 74% of the East-West metro project is owned by India’s Railway & remaining 26% by the nation’s Ministry of Housing & Urban Affairs.

    Incorrect

    Answer-3) Kolkata
    Explanation:
    On January 28,2020 Kolkata Metro Rail Corporation (KMRC) is set to complete its East-West Project, which runs partly under the Hooghly river, West Bengal, by March 2022. It will be India’s first underwater metro. The new metro rail is expected to carry about 900,000 people daily & will take less than a minute to cross a 520-meter underwater tunnel. 74% of the East-West metro project is owned by India’s Railway & remaining 26% by the nation’s Ministry of Housing & Urban Affairs.

  27. Question 27 of 50
    27. Question
    1 points
    Category: Current Affairs

    Who chaired the Rajya Sabha Panel on child pornography that submits 40 recommendations to Muppavarapu Venkaiah Naidu ?

    Correct

    Answer-2) Jairam Ramesh
    Explanation:
    On January 25,2020, An ad hoc committee of the Rajya Sabha (RS) headed by Congress parliamentarian Jairam Ramesh submitted its report on child pornography to Vice President (VP) and Rajya Sabha Chairman Muppavarapu Venkaiah Naidu.In it, 40 recommendations have been made to strictly prohibit the promotion and access of child pornography and related content through social media. This includes amendments to POSCO (Protection of Children from Sexual Offences) Act ,2012 and IT (Information Technology) act ,2000 & to control children’s access to such content containing generation and dissemination of Child Sexual Abuse Material (CSAM).

    Incorrect

    Answer-2) Jairam Ramesh
    Explanation:
    On January 25,2020, An ad hoc committee of the Rajya Sabha (RS) headed by Congress parliamentarian Jairam Ramesh submitted its report on child pornography to Vice President (VP) and Rajya Sabha Chairman Muppavarapu Venkaiah Naidu.In it, 40 recommendations have been made to strictly prohibit the promotion and access of child pornography and related content through social media. This includes amendments to POSCO (Protection of Children from Sexual Offences) Act ,2012 and IT (Information Technology) act ,2000 & to control children’s access to such content containing generation and dissemination of Child Sexual Abuse Material (CSAM).

    Where was the World’s largest meditation centre inaugurated to mark the 75th anniversary of the formation of Shri Ram Chandra Mission (SRCM) and Heartfulness Institute ?

    Correct

    Answer-3) Hyderabad, Telangana
    Explanation:
    On January 28, 2020 the World’s largest meditation centre was inaugurated at Kanha Shanti Vanam in Hyderabad, Telangana to mark the 75th anniversary of the formation of Shri Ram Chandra Mission (SRCM) and Heartfulness Institute. The center is dedicated to the first guide of Heartfulness Lalaji Maharaji. It can accommodate 1 lakh practitioners at a time. To celebrate the 75th anniversary, special sessions will be addressed by President Ram Nath Kovind on February 2, 2020 and social activist Anna Hazare on February 8, 2020.

    Incorrect

    Answer-3) Hyderabad, Telangana
    Explanation:
    On January 28, 2020 the World’s largest meditation centre was inaugurated at Kanha Shanti Vanam in Hyderabad, Telangana to mark the 75th anniversary of the formation of Shri Ram Chandra Mission (SRCM) and Heartfulness Institute. The center is dedicated to the first guide of Heartfulness Lalaji Maharaji. It can accommodate 1 lakh practitioners at a time. To celebrate the 75th anniversary, special sessions will be addressed by President Ram Nath Kovind on February 2, 2020 and social activist Anna Hazare on February 8, 2020.

  30. Question 30 of 50
    30. Question
    1 points
    Category: Current Affairs

    Where was the India’s 1st & biggest ‘walk-through’ aviary inaugurated ?

    Correct

    Answer-1) Byculla Zoo in Mumbai, Maharashtra
    Explanation:
    On January 26, 2020, Chief Minister of Maharashtra Uddhav Thackeray inaugurated the country’s first and biggest ‘walk-through’ aviary in Veermata Jijabai Bhosale Udyan and Zoo also known as Byculla Zoo in Mumbai, Maharashtra.The aviary is spread over in 18,234 sq ft, is 44 feet tall and consists of 100 species of Indian and exotic birds.The special enclosures for animals like bears, hyenas, leopards, fox, barasingha and antelope are completed and Asiatic Lion, tigers will be included soon.

    Incorrect

    Answer-1) Byculla Zoo in Mumbai, Maharashtra
    Explanation:
    On January 26, 2020, Chief Minister of Maharashtra Uddhav Thackeray inaugurated the country’s first and biggest ‘walk-through’ aviary in Veermata Jijabai Bhosale Udyan and Zoo also known as Byculla Zoo in Mumbai, Maharashtra.The aviary is spread over in 18,234 sq ft, is 44 feet tall and consists of 100 species of Indian and exotic birds.The special enclosures for animals like bears, hyenas, leopards, fox, barasingha and antelope are completed and Asiatic Lion, tigers will be included soon.

  31. Question 31 of 50
    31. Question
    1 points
    Category: Current Affairs

    What is the upper limit for abortions of special category women raised from 20 weeks by cabinet recently?

    Correct

    Answer-1) 24 weeks
    Explanation:
    The CCEA has given its approval to the Medical Termination of Pregnancy (Amendment) Bill, 2020. This bill which will be introduced in parliament soon will amend the Medical Termination of Pregnancy Act, 1971. Opinion on pregnancy termination: Opinion of 1 provider to terminate pregnancy up to 20 weeks of gestation (period of development inside the womb) will be required. For 20-24 weeks opinion of 2 providers will be required for termination. 24 week gestation limit: Upper gestation limit from 20 to 24weeks will be defined in the amendments to MTP (Medical Termination of Pregnancy) rules for special category women. The special category includes survivors of rape, victims of incest, differently-abled women, Minors etc.

    Incorrect

    Answer-1) 24 weeks
    Explanation:
    The CCEA has given its approval to the Medical Termination of Pregnancy (Amendment) Bill, 2020. This bill which will be introduced in parliament soon will amend the Medical Termination of Pregnancy Act, 1971. Opinion on pregnancy termination: Opinion of 1 provider to terminate pregnancy up to 20 weeks of gestation (period of development inside the womb) will be required. For 20-24 weeks opinion of 2 providers will be required for termination. 24 week gestation limit: Upper gestation limit from 20 to 24weeks will be defined in the amendments to MTP (Medical Termination of Pregnancy) rules for special category women. The special category includes survivors of rape, victims of incest, differently-abled women, Minors etc.

    Answer-2) Mangaluru, Karnataka
    Explanation:

The boat will be operational under the administrative control of Commander of the Coast Guard Region (West) Inspector General AP Badola. Apart from this, it was also announced that Kerala govt through its Karnataka Industrial Area Development Board (KIADB), had sanctioned 160 acres of land in Kenjar for the Indian Coast Guard Academy (ICGA) in Mangaluru at a total cost of Rs 1,010 crore.

    Incorrect

    Answer-2) Mangaluru, Karnataka
    Explanation:
    On January 29, 2020, the Indian Coast Guard (ICG) has commissioned a 3rd high-speed interceptor boat C-448 in Mangaluru, Karnataka. The boat will be operational under the administrative control of Commander of the Coast Guard Region (West) Inspector General AP Badola. Apart from this, it was also announced that Kerala govt through its Karnataka Industrial Area Development Board (KIADB), had sanctioned 160 acres of land in Kenjar for the Indian Coast Guard Academy (ICGA) in Mangaluru at a total cost of Rs 1,010 crore.

The memorial has been built at Mokokchung, Nagaland (one of the cultural & intellectual center), which was planned & executed by Inspector General Assam Rifles (North), will be inaugurated soon.

    Incorrect

    Answer-3) Nagaland
    Explanation:
    On January 30,2020 Assam Rifles (military unit) has constructed a war memorial “Veer Samriti” in Nagaland, Kohima for 357 Army & Assam Rifles, died while fighting against insurgency against north-eastern state. The memorial has been built at Mokokchung, Nagaland (one of the cultural & intellectual center), which was planned & executed by Inspector General Assam Rifles (North), will be inaugurated soon.

  35. Question 35 of 50
    35. Question
    1 points
    Category: Current Affairs

    What is the Gross Domestic Product (GDP) growth of India for 2019-20 (Fiscal year –FY 20) as per the Federation of Indian Chambers of Commerce and Industry (FICCI)’s “Economic Outlook Survey 2020” ?

    Correct

    Answer-3) 5%
    Explanation:
    On January 29, 2020, Federation of Indian Chambers of Commerce and Industry (FICCI), an association of business organizations in India, in its “Economic Outlook Survey 2020”, has projected India’ s annual median GDP (Gross Domestic Product) growth at 5% for 2019-20 (Fiscal year –FY 20).It is in line with the National Statistical Organisation’s (NSO) projected growth rate (5%, a 11-year low).

    Incorrect

    Answer-3) 5%
    Explanation:
    On January 29, 2020, Federation of Indian Chambers of Commerce and Industry (FICCI), an association of business organizations in India, in its “Economic Outlook Survey 2020”, has projected India’ s annual median GDP (Gross Domestic Product) growth at 5% for 2019-20 (Fiscal year –FY 20).It is in line with the National Statistical Organisation’s (NSO) projected growth rate (5%, a 11-year low).

  36. Question 36 of 50
    36. Question
    1 points
    Category: Current Affairs

    Janak Raj was appointed as the internal member of the Monetary Policy Committee (MPC), he succeeds __________ .

    Correct

    Answer-1) Michael Debabrata Patra
    Explanation:
    On January 29,2020 ED Janak Raj was nominated as the third internal member of the Monetary Policy Committee (MPC) by the Reserve Bank of India (RBI), Mumbai. He was the successor of Dr. Michael Debabrata Patra as he was appointed as Deputy Governor of RBI. ED Janak is the executive director in-charge of the monetary policy department.The monetary policy committee is responsible for fixing the benchmark interest rate in India and consists of 6 members.MPC is headed by RBI Governor. The 6 internal members of MPC consists of 3 members from RBI, 2 internal members are Governor and Deputy Governor in-charge of monetary policy & the last member any RBI officer.The 6 internal members are: Dr. Chetan Ghate, Dr. Pami Dua, ED Janak Raj , Dr. Ravindra H. Dholakia, Shri Bibhu Prasad Kanungo, Shri Shaktikanta Das.

    Incorrect

    Answer-1) Michael Debabrata Patra
    Explanation:
    On January 29,2020 ED Janak Raj was nominated as the third internal member of the Monetary Policy Committee (MPC) by the Reserve Bank of India (RBI), Mumbai. He was the successor of Dr. Michael Debabrata Patra as he was appointed as Deputy Governor of RBI. ED Janak is the executive director in-charge of the monetary policy department.The monetary policy committee is responsible for fixing the benchmark interest rate in India and consists of 6 members.MPC is headed by RBI Governor. The 6 internal members of MPC consists of 3 members from RBI, 2 internal members are Governor and Deputy Governor in-charge of monetary policy & the last member any RBI officer.The 6 internal members are: Dr. Chetan Ghate, Dr. Pami Dua, ED Janak Raj , Dr. Ravindra H. Dholakia, Shri Bibhu Prasad Kanungo, Shri Shaktikanta Das.

  37. Question 37 of 50
    37. Question
    1 points
    Category: Current Affairs

    As per 9th edition of Tomton traffic Index 2019, Provided by Tomton a Dutch Multinational developer company which Indian state tops the list of most congested city of the world?

    Correct

    Answer-1) Bengaluru
    Explanation:
    Tomtom, A Dutch multinational developer company has released its 9th edition of Tomtom Traffic Index 2019. As per the index, Bengaluru (Karnataka) emerged as the worst traffic congested cities in the world with 103% congestion. Along with Bengaluru, 3 other Indian Cities placed in top 10 are Mumbai (4), Pune (5), Delhi (8). Abu Dhabi is the least congested city with 10% congestion recorded.

    Incorrect

    Answer-1) Bengaluru
    Explanation:
    Tomtom, A Dutch multinational developer company has released its 9th edition of Tomtom Traffic Index 2019. As per the index, Bengaluru (Karnataka) emerged as the worst traffic congested cities in the world with 103% congestion. Along with Bengaluru, 3 other Indian Cities placed in top 10 are Mumbai (4), Pune (5), Delhi (8). Abu Dhabi is the least congested city with 10% congestion recorded.

  38. Question 38 of 50
    38. Question
    1 points
    Category: Current Affairs

    Which Bank operating in India launched the tool ‘iBox’ first of its kind do 24*7 self service delivery at one of its branch in Mumbai (January 2020)?

    Correct

    Answer-3) Industrial Credit and Investment Corporation of India (ICICI) Bank
    Explanation:
    ICICI (Industrial Credit and Investment Corporation of India) Bank, an Indian financial institution, has launched first-of-its-kind 24×7 self-service delivery tool for customers called “iBox” at one of its branches in Mumbai, Maharashtra.Under this facility, customers will now be able to take their debit, credit card, check book and return check from the branch close to their home or office.The iBox terminals are installed outside the premises of the bank’s branches, which can be used even after the bank closes.

    Incorrect

    Answer-3) Industrial Credit and Investment Corporation of India (ICICI) Bank
    Explanation:
    ICICI (Industrial Credit and Investment Corporation of India) Bank, an Indian financial institution, has launched first-of-its-kind 24×7 self-service delivery tool for customers called “iBox” at one of its branches in Mumbai, Maharashtra.Under this facility, customers will now be able to take their debit, credit card, check book and return check from the branch close to their home or office.The iBox terminals are installed outside the premises of the bank’s branches, which can be used even after the bank closes.
